Name: Albedo
Voice Line: I am Albedo, Chief Alchemist of the Knights of Favonius. You carry the aura of the stars, interesting... I would like to study you, if you do not mind. I'm certain we will have many opportunities to be alone in the future.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: What a view... How about a quick break so I can sketch this beautiful scenery?

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: "The truth of this world"... *sigh* What could it be?

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Going out into the world and investigating, turning the "unknown" into the "known." ...Ahhh, I missed this feeling.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: The soil is moist, ideal for collecting the roots of Boom Blossoms. No please, allow me to handle this.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Master...

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Ample light... active biological organisms... Yes, this is a good place to sketch.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Good morning. Are we going to search for ancient relics today?

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Good afternoon. I heard your footsteps. My, it certainly is lively outside of the workshop.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: *sigh* It's gotten quiet outside...

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Good night, you go ahead and rest. I will just finish one last experiment before bed... If you are interested in the results, I can discuss them with you tomorrow.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Genius? ...A number of people call me that. But I don't think I'm any "genius.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Relationships are... quite troublesome. Once you establish a relation with someone, you must continue to maintain it; if you lose contact, you must reestablish the relation. This taxing cycle requires a lot of time...

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: You... want to accompany me while I experiment? I'm honored.Oh, don't be nervous. My experiments may be dangerous, but no one gets hurt... most of the time.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Would you oblige me by serving as my assistant? After observing so many experiments, you surely know a good deal about alchemy by now. Relax, we will work together. I don't think you will have any problems. I have faith in my ability to instruct you, and even more faith in your exceptional talents.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: My Vision? Ah, that's nothing more than a tool to aid in my experiments, no different from a beaker or crucible. The one thing about it that really intrigues me is the principle behind how it works... One day, I will uncover its secrets, it's only a matter of time.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: There's something I've always wanted to ask you, but feared rejection and disappointment...Eh-hem... I am very interested in your little floating companion. May I borrow her to investigate for a short while?

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: You would like to know more about petrified trees? Erm... Actually, the petrified trees you have come across in domains aren't that ancient. Truly ancient trees usually grow to around one or two miles in height. Oh, and there's a kind of large spider that lives around their roots — if you tie one up in cape jasmine and lemongrass and sprinkle on some cardamom, smoke it for a few hours — you get a fragrant taste that's simply... unforgettable.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Family? Although Alice has always asked me to call her mother.... when I think of the idea of "family", my master comes to mind first. My earliest memories in life are of going on adventures with her. She taught me the art of alchemy and much knowledge about the world. Perhaps... even the words "family" and "master" are incapable of fully expressing her meaning to me.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Sucrose? I think I more or less understand why she is so dedicated to her research in bio-alchemy... Either way, I'm happy to see her succeed more and more in her endeavors.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Working with Sucrose on alchemy research is quite pleasant, but she has some... stubborn qualities in regards to certain aspects unrelated to research. For example, I have told her numerous times to just call me "Albedo" since we are about the same age, but she insists on addressing me in an excessively formal manner. ...Whatever she prefers, I guess.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Lisa? I always am impressed by the valuable perspectives she brings to discussions. But is a person with her talents satisfied with such a basic occupation as librarian? There must be some hidden reason for this.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Indeed, I view Klee as my younger sister. Whenever she gets herself into some explosive sort of trouble, I can only console myself with the fact that her current destructiveness is nothing compared to that of Miss Alice.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Jean? She has served exceptionally well as Acting Grand Master, one can even say she is more reliable than Grand Master Varka. Perhaps in our hearts, we all eagerly await the day she can become the official Grand Master herself.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Oh, Xingqiu? I find his written works quite interesting. The Yae Publishing House in Inazuma has been asking that I cooperate with a different author for greater royalties. Hmph, do I seem the type to be swayed by a few extra Mora?

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Barbara? She's a very earnest Deaconess. I once had the opportunity to sketch her a simple portrait... What happened to the sketch? Ah yes... Albert offered to purchase it, but I rejected his bid and gave it to the Acting Grand Master. Social relations... really require a lot of effort.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Have a question for me? Go ahead, ask. It doesn't take too long to ask a single question, does it? I'm about to begin the final stage of an experiment...

Name: Albedo
Topic: More About Albedo: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: Oh, by the way. Did you know that without human manipulation, you would need to harness the power of a sun eight times the size of our own in order to naturally create gold?

Name: Albedo
Topic: More About Albedo: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: The time required to sketch portraits closely correlates with one's mood. I could spend half a day sketching Huffman, while I might only need three strokes of the pencil to sketch Kaeya — one for the face, one for the eyepatch string... and one for the eyepatch.

Name: Albedo
Topic: More About Albedo: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: What do I do besides sketching and research...? I will occasionally read novels from Inazuma and Liyue. They contain many fascinating ideas which can sometimes provide me with unexpected inspirations for my own creations.

Name: Albedo
Topic: More About Albedo: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: Even now, I find the nigredo processing stage of alchemy passed down by my master to be full of mystery. What did my master want to create using this technique...? My research is far from over, I will require your help to investigate further.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Hmm... Besides research, the activity I spend most of my time on is probably sketching. At first I saw it simply as a way to better study the structure of living things and materials so as to aid me in my experiments, but it eventually became a hobby of mine. Indeed, it is a very good way to relax.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: There's just never enough time, is there? Even when I remove the most troublesome matters from my schedule, I still can't find enough time for everything.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: I really do enjoy having dessert. How can I put it...? When both physical and mental capacity are spent, high-energy materials further provide a kind of primordial, highly-effective boost.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: What food do I dislike? ...Large portions of meat at restaurants. I have a rather small appetite, so a meal like that only ends up in tragedy — either I overeat and the joy of the taste is lost, or I don't finish it and the food is wasted. I decided to simply not go to restaurants, although that has also meant I must spend more time preparing my own food...

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: If flavors were colors... this one would be gold.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: You're willing to spend so much time on improving your cooking, and that's precisely how you're able to make it taste so good.

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: This is more than I can manage... maybe we could split it between us?

Name: Albedo
Voice Line: Happy birthday. You look especially happy, would you mind if I sketched you? The capacity of our brains is limited, so we are bound to forget things. But when an image is transferred onto paper or canvas, the sketch becomes an extension of our memory. We can remember that past feeling when we later look at the sketch.

Name: Albedo
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: Nigredo is the first step in alchemy, drawing from primordial forms. As beings who live in this world, we must find our own meaning.

Name: Albedo
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: Albedo is the step in which change begins. Clearing away the excess so we can take on all the knowledge that is available. Would you like to investigate this world with me?

Name: Albedo
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: Rubedo in alchemy refers to the refining of feeling. I feel the refining of my own emotions is also thanks to you.

Name: Albedo
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: Citrinitas is the final stage of the alchemical transmutation process. The meaning of the object being transmuted has finally been brought to light, becoming gold and revealing its true value... I too have found my own meaning.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Aloy here. I don't know this world, but my arrows are sharp and my bow's ready. If your party needs help, I'll do what I can.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Come on. Enough standing around, let's keep moving.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Let's get going. There are people who need our help.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Rain. One way to wash off the grime.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Sky's running out of rain for now. Time to dry off.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: The world always seems quieter when it snows.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Wind's kicking up again. Feels good to breathe it in.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Wind is really whipping now. My face feels raw.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Morning. World's starting to stir again. Me too, I guess.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Day's half over, but we still have a lot to do.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Sunset. We'll be under the stars soon.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Night's here. Time to rest, unless we're going on by starlight.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: I grew up an outcast, and it wasn't much fun. Even though I'm a stranger here, people are friendlier than the tribe that was supposed to raise me. It's... nice.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Everything I do is in the service of life, not death. That's why I'm here with you.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: An oath seems like a formality. But if you want mine, you've got it.

Name: Aloy
Topic: About Us: Moving Forward Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: I'll do whatever it takes to finish this with you. I won't hesitate. I won't falter.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: If I have to share something, it'll be my bow... in the service of people who need the help.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: This land has a past full of secrets, just like my world. I'll uncover all of it, if I have enough time.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: I'm not much for talking about myself. The mission is what's important.

Name: Aloy
Topic: More About Aloy: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: I never had parents. But a man named Rost raised me. He was stern, but kind and generous. And he trained me well. I miss him.

Name: Aloy
Topic: More About Aloy: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: I spent my whole life looking for my mother and never found her, not really. But I found ancient messages from the woman I was... cloned from. It felt like she knew me. And how to inspire me.

Name: Aloy
Topic: More About Aloy: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: When I grew up, I didn't have any friends. Later in my travels, I made some. But I left that world before we could grow close. That's why I'm glad to have spent time with you.

Name: Aloy
Topic: More About Aloy: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: Trust doesn't come easy for me, but I know I can trust you. You're a true friend, and I don't say that often.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Not sure if I have a hobby, unless you count reading things from the past. So, history... I guess?

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: One world needed saving. Now another. There's never time to rest.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: I'm not picky. Anything's better than traveling on an empty stomach.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Had an Oseram stew once that was so thick you could pave a road with it. Ugh.

Name: Aloy
Voice Line: Never put much stock in birthdays. Where I come from, it's a time to celebrate your mother, not yourself. Even so, I wish you a, uh... happy day.

Name: Aloy
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: All right. Feels like we're making progress, but we can't stop now.

Name: Aloy
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: Getting better. Getting stronger. Always a good thing.

Name: Aloy
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: No matter how good a hunter you are, you can always get better. Never rest. Never stop learning.

Name: Aloy
Topic: Feelings about Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: When we started out, you were just another stranger in a world I didn't understand. But after everything we've been through, I can say this for certain: My bow is yours, now and always.

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Outrider Amber reporting for duty! Just say the word if you ever need my help!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: I feel like running.

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Jean will be upset if she catches us lazing around like this.

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Hey, there's something strange over there... C'mon, let's take a look!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Oh no, it's raining... now my uniform will get all wet...

Name: Amber
Voice Line: It's raining again... This will hinder our vision, we must remain vigilant!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Wow~ This weather is awesome!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: If only the wind was a little stronger...

Name: Amber
Voice Line: This breeze... so refreshing!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: I love this kind of weather, ahh... so relaxing~

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Morning! Want to go on a jog?

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Can I get lunch with you?

Name: Amber
Voice Line: It's getting late, should I light a torch?

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Agreed, getting rest is essential! Let's meet here tomorrow then. See ya!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Mondstadt Gliding Champion, yep, that's me! Gliding Champion!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Remember that I don't go easy on anyone, even you!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: When I'm teaching you to glide, I feel like I can go even faster than usual... Huh? What are you laughing at? I'll prove it! We can race — right now!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: My Vision... Is a sign that the Archons believe in me. Yes, I must become the best Outrider I can possibly be!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: The view from the Cathedral's clock tower is amazing! You should check it out.

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Look, there's a pigeon over there! *giggle* I wish I could fly alongside them.

Name: Amber
Voice Line: After the Grand Master left on his expedition, all the affairs of the Knights of Favonius, both big and small, have been left up to Jean. If only there was more I could do to help her...

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Jean might still be working? We should invite her for coffee... Let's go.

Name: Amber
Topic: About Lisa: Listening to Stories Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: When you have time, we should go see Lisa! Last time I saw her, she was telling me about a story involving a treasure in the Dragonspine area. But, we got cut off before she could finish. I can't wait to hear the rest of her story!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: If Lisa's not sleeping, she'll be reading! I don't know how she does it, I wouldn't be able to sit still for that long.

Name: Amber
Voice Line: ...I'm feeling uneasy all of a sudden! Was that Kaeya with you earlier? Did he give you any trouble?

Name: Amber
Voice Line: There's something weird-looking about the dandelions in the garden... Hmm, I bet Kaeya had something to do with this!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Hmm? Bennett... I feel like I've heard that name before... Oh! Yes, he's that hot-blooded guy from the Adventurers' Guild, right! I tend to come across him way out in the wild from time to time, he seems to really love treasure hunting.

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Klee? She can be a bit cheeky sometimes, but everyone in the Knights of Favonius likes her. Although... I really ought to keep a closer eye on her if I wanna keep her from getting put in confinement by Jean again.

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Albedo spends most of his time in his workshop, tinkering away with all of his awesome stuff. But, when you see him in person, you never can quite tell what he's thinking... Who knows what goes on in that mind of his...(Actual Voice-Over: Albedo spends most of his time in his workshop, tinkering away with all of his awesome stuff. But, when you see him in person, you can never quite tell what he's thinking... Not a clue at all...)

Name: Amber
Voice Line: You wanna know about Noelle? She's super resilient. Still, since she's younger than us we should still look out for her.(Actual Voice-Over: You wanna know about Noelle? She's incredibly resilient. Still, as our predecessor, we should do what we can to help her out.)

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Eula is a great friend of mine! You just need to get used to her sense of humor and you'll get along fine! The only reason she's misunderstood by so many people is her family name. How can I get them to see her for who she really is?

Name: Amber
Topic: About Collei Friendship Lv. 4 Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
Voice Line: Collei wrote to me saying that her Eleazar has been completely cured... I'm so happy for her! I wish I could fly to her side right now and give her the biggest hug! She also said she misses everyone in Mondstadt, and that once she's ready, she'll come visit us in person and tell us all about her progress... Oh, it would be great if she could make it in time for the next Ludi Harpastum. Aaah I can't wait to see her again!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Oh! Mika's a veteran of Eula's team. When he first arrived, it was always "Yes, Commander!" every time he spoke to me — I guess it must have been because he saw how close I was with Eula. But then, even after I told him I was actually an Outrider, he still called me "Ma'am"... It was so embarrassing. We have completely different responsibilities, after all. I definitely could never match his expertise in cartography.

Name: Amber
Voice Line: I'm a pro at hunting, you know! How about I show you some of my skills? Or even better... how about a little competition?

Name: Amber
Topic: More About Amber: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: I'll share my ultimate Gliding Champion secret with you! The most important thing to remember, is to have courage!

Name: Amber
Topic: More About Amber: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: I'm really not that good with riddles. I always try to avoid the riddles stand during Ludi Harpastum... What about you?

Name: Amber
Topic: More About Amber: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: I joined the Knights because of my grandpa, I stayed because of Jean. ...And now, you're the one that showed me the world beyond Mondstadt. I couldn't be happier.

Name: Amber
Topic: More About Amber: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: I would like to explore the other worlds beyond. I wanna see how deep the rabbit hole goes! You'll keep me company right, right?

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Baron Bunny, today is another squeaky clean day!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Oh... Do you have any idea how to make a decent Moon Pie?

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Jean makes the most amazing cup of coffee! You'll have to try it sometime.

Name: Amber
Voice Line: I can handle anything and everything! As long as it isn't cold Wolfhook juice... Ugh, yuck...

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Wow! This is delicious, you're an amazing cook!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: I wish I was as good at cooking as you...

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Uh, I'm just not used to this taste, sorry! Nothing to do with you of course!

Name: Amber
Voice Line: Hey, Happy Birthday! Here, I have a gift for you: an exclusive, custom-made version of Baron Bunny that I sewed for you myself... Don't worry, "custom-made" means that it won't explode!

Name: Amber
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: Yeah! As fast as riding the wind!

Name: Amber
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: At this speed, no one can keep up with me!

Name: Amber
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: The skies over Mondstadt seem to have gotten smaller... or is it that my sight reaches further than ever before?

Name: Amber
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: It seems that now... I've improved so much compared to when we first met! Hehe, thank you so much! Let me treat you to a Sticky Honey Roast! Let's go, let's go!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: I'm the head honcho of the Arataki Gang, and everyone knows my name...s. Names, I have many.Arataki "The One and Oni" IttoArataki "The Oni Sumo King" IttoArataki "The Pride of Oni" IttoArataki "Beetle Gladiator" IttoArataki "The Ultimate TCG Champion" IttoArataki "He Might Lose but He'll Never Admit Defeatto"...Anyway, these are some of the ones I usually go by, so go ahead, take your pick. I'll respond to whichever one you choose, I promise. Hehe, you're welcome.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Arataki "Numero Uno" Itto, here in the flesh! Hahaha... *cough*

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Best flavor in the world? The sweet, sweet taste of victory. And that's why I've never spent a single Mora on any of my snacks — I've won 'em all fair and square... That's right.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Don't underestimate the beetle — they can be some of the toughest little guys around! Yes you can, yes you can— Wanna know what's on this beetle's diet? Sweat and tears, that's what! That's how it gets stronger... I think we can all learn somethin' from that!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Pff, real men don't carry umbrellas... Oh boy, wow, it's really starting to pick up. Uh quick, c'mon, get yours out! C'mon, quick, quick, quick!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Hey! Raiden Shogun, is that you? Well guess what — you're not the boss of me. Uh-huh, that's right, you heard me! Go ahead, strike me down!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Alright, it's time for a snowball fight! You're never gonna win, though, I... Ha, ah... Ah-choo!!! Whew.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: The sky is clear and the sun is shining... Time to get the Onikabuto out for some training! C'mon little guy, let's go!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Bottom line: Never let the wind get to you. Especially when you've got a killer hairstyle like mine. Oh yeah!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Morning, sunshine! Hey, uh... So listen, I'm fresh out of Mora... again. But hey, who needs some lousy job when we can just go find somewhere fun to hang out! Haha, whaddya say?

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Now that we've had some grub, why don't we go find somewhere to kick it for a while? Hanamizaka? Nah, boring. Tenryou Commission... No, no, no... Ah, forget it, let's go hang around Ritou!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Shh! You hear that? *gasp* Oh no... it's a ghost, RUN!!! ... Haha, psyche! Ah, I got you good there! ... I got you, didn't I?

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: If you're tired, go ahead and call it a night. Hmm? Me? Oh, don't worry... I sleep with my eyes open... Haha... Literally.

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: About Itto: Getting a Real Job
Voice Line: Oh, so they're saying I can't hold down a real job, huh? Well! Hahaha! Sorry to break it to ya, but I'm a delinquent. That means it's my job to not have a real job, and if anyone's got a problem with that... Who's got a problem with that, huh? You got a problem with that!? You got a problem with— *coughing* Sorry. Got a little worked up there. Where was I? Ah yeah, so work isn't really my thing, but don't worry — I don't rob or steal or anything like that. When I'm really runnin' low on funds, I just take the odd job here and there to make ends meet. You know, like transporting stuff, delivering documents, helping businesses attract customers... Just enough to keep the wolf from the door. Hehe!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: The oni have been through a lot to get to where we are today, and look at us now — living peacefully alongside the humans. Unfortunately, there's still plenty of people out there who've got a bone to pick with us. Hmm? Change? Oh yeah, things are gonna change, alright! You can count on that! But I'll tell you what, it won't involve any sucking up to the humans on my part, nuh-uh! I'm gonna let my actions do the talkin'. They'll come to respect me eventually.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Hey, so I always see you running around everywhere doing this and that for other people, but you're not in it for the Mora, are you? No, you're just straight-up lookin' out for your fellow man. I know a true homie when I see one, and no one appreciates a homies' homie more than yours truly. Put it here, partner! You and I are gonna make a great team, I just know it!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: You know what, I gotta admit — I respect you, always have. I could really see you as a member of the gang, you know — I mean, you really have what it takes... Whaddya say? I've even come up with a catchy title to tag on after your name, get this: "The Traveler, 'Second to One'"! Get it? 'Cause y'know, I'm numero uno, you're my number two, and together we're the most powerful duo in the whole friggin' world, baby! Hahaha! Ah... But, uh, all jokes aside, I know you're on some important journey or whatever. So, go ahead! Get out there and do whatcha wanna do! Just remember, the Arataki Gang will always answer your call.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Ugh, don't even ask. Just the thought of it makes my blood boil! First, the Shogun's Army goes out and steals everyone's precious Visions — which, already a heinous crime, right? But then... then they go and stick them all over that statue with absolutely no sense of organization whatsoever. I mean, think about it... the more powerful the Vision, the higher up on the statue it should go, that would make sense, right? But nooo, some class-A jerk in the Tenryou Commission thought it'd be funny to put my Vision right at the very bottom! Ugh... Come on!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: If you ever have something on your mind, you can always try writing in to "That's Life" magazine's advice column. Ms. Hina always manages to come up with an encouraging and heartwarming response for all her readers. Just look at me — I used to be a lost soul, but not anymore, and it's all thanks to her. Oh, that reminds me, I managed to sign up for one of her upcoming meet-and-greets! I've been counting down the days — wish it would go faster...

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Question for ya! Do my horns look boring once you get used to them? 'Cause, uh, I was thinking of switching up the style, going for a total overhaul, you know? I'm thinking paint them in rainbow stripes and then strap a few Fireflies on for good measure! Eh, eh? I bet that would turn some heads on the streets... like "Dude, you're rockin' those sweet rainbow horns, man!" ...Ah, man, this is totally genius! I'm gonna round up the gang and get them working on it ASAP.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Wanna know the real secret to catching Onikabuto? It's all in the eyeballs. You gotta keep those bad boys squeaky clean at all times, make sure your eyesight's as sharp as a hawk. Trust me, when you're in the middle of a thunderstorm, and the rain's coming down, and the wind's blowing in your face, you gotta watch out, because Lavender Melons and Onikabuto? Well, they can really start to look the same... believe me, I know.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Some of the boys have been telling me that he was the star of the show at the Vision Hunt Ceremony. I'm like — are you kidding me??? How come he gets his own special ceremony!? Was the hundredth Vision supposed to be, like, stronger than the other ninety-nine, or something? Pff, nah, it can't have been that, 'cause, uh, hello! They would've chosen me if that's what they were going for.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Haha, I only wish I could have met Ayato sooner. He really taught me something. "You can kindle the warrior spirit even in the weakest of bugs"... Yep, I really took that one to heart. If it weren't for those words of wisdom, I'm pretty sure I would have given up beetle fighting after losing for the 780th time... Yeah, I guess sometimes it takes a warrior to understand a warrior. When we're playing trading card games or battling beetles, we're always totally on the same wavelength.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Hmph, she's always showing off her fancy fireworks and toys to the kids. Well, I'm sick of it! Nobody steals my thunder! I'm the one that's supposed to be adored by the kids! Me! That goes for you too, you're siding with me on this, okay... Huh? Whaddya mean, you're not a kid? Eh, details. If you're shorter than me, you're a kid as far as I'm concerned.

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: About Kaedehara Kazuha Friendship Lv. 4 Omnipresence Over Mortals
Voice Line: Word on the street is that he blocked the Musou no Hitotachi after you escaped from Tenshukaku. Seriously? 'Cause I mean, that is awesome! Who knows how he pulled it off. Hey, now that I think about it, he's from a fallen clan, and I'm from a fallen clan... That kinda makes us equals, haha! Yeah, so next time someone attacks you, it's my turn to block the blade!

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: About the Raiden Shogun Friendship Lv. 4 Omnipresence Over Mortals
Voice Line: During the Vision Hunt Decree, the Shogun had to send her top tengu in person to get my Vision off me. Heh, means she must have found me to be quite the pain in the neck. But, y'know, she's abolished the Vision Hunt Decree now, so no hard feelings, I guess. As long as she's learned her lesson, of course. 'Cause if she pulls something like that again, this old pain in the neck will be back with a vengeance.

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: About the Lady with Fox Ears Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: I crushed that Kitsune Ramen eating contest we had. Even all that Fried Tofu couldn't stand in my way — she didn't come close to beating me! ... I was, uh, bedridden for more than a month after that, but you know what? I'd rather lie in bed a winner than walk away a loser! So... Anyway, I had the last laugh, 'cause she had to foot the bill for 32 bowls of noodles! Haha!

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: About Kujou Sara Friendship Lv. 4 The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia
Voice Line: You know what, yeah, she beat me during the Vision Hunt Decree. I'm not ashamed to admit it. When you lose, you admit defeat, and when you screw up, you take it on the chin, like a man! And anyway, let's not forget which one of us won't agree to a rematch — her, the tengu warrior! It's just a sumo street fight, I mean, what's she so afraid of? If she keeps snubbing me, I'm gonna have to stop calling her Kujou Tengu and start calling her Kujou Chicken! Heh, we'll see what she thinks of that.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Oh yeah, the doggy general in the resistance... Hey, I've gotta hand it to him, he may be on the small side, but he's got quite the fighting spirit. Also, he gives off this vibe that makes me feel all warm and fuzzy inside, almost as if he understands my innermost feelings... I mean, I've barely met the guy, so that's kinda weird.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Nobody questions my leadership in the gang, what I say goes — except when it comes to Shinobu. She's always challenging everything I say. And not only that — all the hard-earned loot I bring back and share with everyone? She goes and returns it! But also, she gets me out of jail, and out of every mess we get ourselves into, so I'll let it slide. Besides, I don't wanna get on her bad side... An angry Shinobu would make my life a nightmare.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: All I did was give her a little pat on the head this one time when she wasn't looking, and now, she pounces to attack every time she lays eyes on me. Haha, what can I say? Tanuki are adorable! What am I supposed to do — not pat one on the head? ...Oh yeah, and that's the other thing — she beats you up for calling her a tanuki, too! What's up with that? I mean, a tanuki's what she's going for, right? Sheesh, talk about getting your fur all ruffled over nothing...

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: I know what you're thinking: "I don't see it — how did this guy get to become the boss of the Arataki Gang on the back of beetle fighting and trading card games?" Well, you're right, those are just child's play. Wanna know the hard skills that really got me where I am? Eating ramen standing upside down, sleeping with my eyes open, playing the harmonica with my nose, and swatting houseflies with my hair. Yeah, I know. Betcha see it now, huh?

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: More About Itto: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: People in Inazuma have this ritual every time there's a holiday, or they move, or get sick, or whatever, where they throw beans around and chant: "Fortune beans are falling down, send the oni out of town. Fortune in, oni out. Fortune in, oni out!" ...Ugh, the chant gets worse every time I hear it, but the streets full of beans, with my allergies? Total disaster. I've gotta fix this, for every oni out there! We're innocent, people! Quit trying to ward us off and drive us out every time there's a minor life event!

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: More About Itto: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: In a... "attempt"... to end human prejudice toward the oni, I had the gang use a Kamera to take a picture of me showing my softer side and stick it to the Message Board in Inazuma City. Next thing we know, some jerks have graffitied all over it! Tsk! Then, some ashigaru blockheads from the Tenryou Commission accused me of disrupting the peace, next it was the Yashiro Commission, complaining it ruined the atmosphere in the area, and finally, even the Kanjou Commission got involved — they sent some lackeys over demanding advertising tax! Ugh, they have no idea who the bad guys are here!

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: More About Itto: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: In the Arataki Gang, we're proud to welcome people who've experienced adversity in their lives. Don't listen to the people who call us freaks, or weirdos. Every member of my gang is like family to me, and they all feel the same way. Whatever happens, the gang will face it together — both the highs and the lows.

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: More About Itto: V Friendship Lv. 6 Rise Up, Golden Soul
Voice Line: I gotta respect the Blue Oni for sacrificing themselves so that the Crimson Oni could live on... In principle, though, I'm absolutely against it. No one should have to sacrifice their own kind for the sake of a better tomorrow, period. It's only a better tomorrow if it's a better tomorrow for everyone. We need to work together, not have everyone just focused on themselves, making their own sacrifice, trying to look cool in the process... Eh, I guess there's no changing the past, what's done is done. But from this day forward, no more sacrificing, not on my watch! You go to sacrifice yourself, I'll stand right in your way!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Beetle fighting, trading card games, spinning tops, kendama, hide-and-seek, you name it, I can play it! Whaddya say, pick one and we'll have a little contest? Just make sure you're ready to get thrashed! Hahaha!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Granny Oni isn't an oni at all... In fact, she's the kindest human that has ever lived. She only got her nickname because she took me in. If people have got a problem with me, fine, I don't care what other people think anyway... *sigh* But I wish people wouldn't go after her because of me.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Lollipops are pretty much the best things ever. The candy tastes awesome, but also, it looks really cool just having a stick hanging out of your mouth. It gives me, like... a real punk kind of vibe. Here, you try it!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Uh, well I am an oni! So there's nothing I hate more than beans. Soybeans, Mung Beans, whatever, I hate 'em all. Just touching one is enough to set off my allergies, let alone eating them. We have to get people to resist this constant urge to throw beans everywhere!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Hahahahahahahaha! Mm, mm, mm! I haven't eaten somethin' this good in three whole years!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Fine! I'll let you treat me to a meal today, but know that the Arataki Gang always pays its debts.

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Hey, are you sure you ain't trying to poison me!? Ah!

Name: Arataki Itto
Voice Line: Today's an important day. I had to send the gang away, otherwise they'd be accusing me of favoritism. Here, take a look at this. I got you the greatest birthday gift combo ever! One top-grade Onikabuto — I'll have you know it took me three whole days and nights to catch this bad boy — one out-of-print collectible trading card that took me 300 rounds to get my hands on, and finally, a birthday song performance performed personally by yours truly! Happy Birthday to you, Happy Birthday to you, Happy Biiiirthday dear Traveler, Happy Birthday to youuuu!

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: Now that's what I'm talking about, baby! Woo-haha! Better look out, I'm way stronger now!

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: Ah yeah, this is gonna do wonders for my win ratio!

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: Feel the power, baby! Wanna see me smash a boulder?

Name: Arataki Itto
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: I think "Numero Uno" just went from nickname to reality, boom! Haha! Hey, but just because I made it to the top doesn't mean I'm gonna forget all the things you've done for me, okay? I've still got your back, anytime, anywhere.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Tada! *giggles* Barbara is here~ Leave the healing to me, I will not disappoint you!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: *yawn* All this standing around is making me so sleepy...

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Everyone is working super hard, we should be too!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Are you tired? Try my new spicy energy drink, I'm sure it'll wake you up!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Don't stay out in the rain for too long, you'll catch a cold!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Whoa!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Ooh, snowflakes! Look at them dance!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: This weather is so amazing! I could burst into song.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Don't worry! I will not... be blown away!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Morning~ Let's do our best today.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Oh? You want to hear me sing...? Sorry, the show is... It hasn't started yet.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: I really want to eat some spicy squid at Good Hunter... but my stomach, er... Never mind...

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: We had a great day today! Get some rest.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: "To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward. When I'm uncertain, bless me with the wisdom to distinguish good from evil. When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back..." ...Oops, my apologies, I was just doing my prayers. *giggles* You need something?

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: My dream is to bring a smile to the faces of all the people in my life! As long as I can help you on your journey, I'm happy~

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Thank you for being with me for all this time, I can feel that I'm getting closer to my dream. Hope we can keep this up in the future~!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Everyone has their own desires. To bring together and fulfill those desires and make everyone happy — this is the purpose my Archon has bestowed upon me.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: I could never get bored of the breathtakingly beautiful nature that surrounds Mondstadt. I've heard that there are blue trees that exist by the sea shore near Inazuma City. I just need to save up a little more, and... What's that? You want to know what I'm saving up for? *chuckles* That's my little secret.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Sunflowers always face the sun. They're so bright. In fact, my mother sent me a sunflower-style dress... I wonder when I'll finally get to wear it on stage?

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Acting Grand Master... Leader of the Knights of Favonius... Everyone seems to like her a lot. Oh? Me? I... Of course I have nothing but admiration for her!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: I always take good care of Lisa. If she ever wants to become a star, she'll have my unconditional support, I'll cheer at the top of my lungs until my voice goes hoarse... Hmm, that might scare off her other fans though...

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: I've seen Amber rushing out of Mondstadt on a mission countless times. Being an Outrider doesn't look easy.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Oh, Master Diluc? Last time, when I was performing at Angel's Share, he kept frowning... Maybe he doesn't like my singing?

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Venti's voice is amazing! But the songs he sings and the ones I'm good at are very different. I tried to learn them but... the melodies are just so complicated.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Bennett always comes to the Cathedral covered in scrapes and bruises... Though it clearly never bothers him a bit, given the big grin he always has on his face. He really should take better care of himself.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: My father left on the expedition with Grand Master Varka... I hope they are okay. Oh, what am I worried about? The Grand Master is none other than the Knight of Boreas, of course they will be fine! Still, I will be sure to pray for their safe return.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Sister Rosaria is hard to get to know, especially given she never joins in on prayers, but... Oh, I'm sure she believes in the Anemo Archon! Although, I still don't really have the courage to try to talk to her...

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Noelle is just the cutest! She's so kind and patient, you just feel totally relaxed when you're around her. ...Oh yeah, and she makes the tastiest snacks! Best part is, they're also healthy. Tee-hee!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Knights look so cool when they swing their sword in combat! Don't you think so? I tried using a sword before but... *sigh* Uh, let's just say I have zero talent with a sword.

Name: Barbara
Topic: More About Barbara: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: I want to heal everyone. This simple thought was all the motivation I needed to become a Deaconess. As long as I'm able to help everyone, I'll be content.

Name: Barbara
Topic: More About Barbara: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: Being an idol, I learned from Alice that "A true idol should always try to heal the soul of the people..." Yes, I completely agree.

Name: Barbara
Topic: More About Barbara: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: I'm doing my best everyday... I hope my efforts earn the trust of the people of Mondstadt.

Name: Barbara
Topic: More About Barbara: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: Every time I get on stage I always start to doubt myself — can I really heal every person in Mondstadt? But I look at you now, and I feel that as long as we keep marching forward, maybe one day I might just— Huh? I've already healed you? Well, one's not enough! I've already healed a lot of people? I suppose...

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: The smiles on the faces of the people I've helped keeps me going.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: My companions keep getting injured, but I'm unable to share the burden of their pain. The only thing I can do is my absolute very best to heal their wounds! I'll make sure that everyone is healthy.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Do you like spicy dried fish? I have two in my bag. Here, have one!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: I don't like anything bitter, especially... ugh, bitter gourd.

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: It's a rare pleasure to eat food that suits my tastes so well. Today is a blessed day!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Thank you for cooking these for me. This time around, you are the one healing me!

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Oh, uh, oh dear...

Name: Barbara
Voice Line: Here you go! This is the gift I got for your birthday, along with my exclusive autograph! Hehe, when my next song comes out, I'll make sure you're the first one to hear it! Happy birthday!

Name: Barbara
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: A dance from Barbara, to bring you more healing!

Name: Barbara
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: Aw, thank you so much for your support! Oh no, I'm too excited, my heart just can't stop racing!

Name: Barbara
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: Please, tell me how I can be stronger! Just leave it up to you? No, no, that won't do! I want to help too!

Name: Barbara
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: Traveling with you, I have discovered that the world is my stage! Thank you so much! *giggles* Ok! Let's shout it one more time! Three, two, one — Go Barbara, go!

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: I'm Beidou. You've heard of my ship, The Crux, and its crew? If you too love adventure, then join me. I've got your back.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: If you ever want to trade tactics, I'm always ready.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Ah! A cold beer after a hard day's work... Nothing like it!

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: It's hard to remain on dry land for so long. Can never seem to quite get my land legs back.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: When stuck on a deserted island, rain is a precious source of drinking water. There's no need for it now though.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Hey, it's just a little lightning. No need to fear it on the open ocean, so there's even less need to fear it on dry land.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: This weather would be great for setting sail.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Wind's picking up. If sand gets in your eyes, be sure not to rub them.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Yo, good morning. I'm about to head off, coming with me?

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Let's get Xiangling to whip us up something for lunch. Believe me, a hot meal from her is far better than the salted fish we eat out at sea.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Alright, I'm off for a drink. Hahaha, no one willing to sell you a proper drink, huh? Perhaps I can...

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Time moves quickly. Haha, go, may the wind be at your back.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: We're setting sail! Men, to your posts! A new adventure is about to begin!

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: I'm the captain, so you can be my first mate! Deal? Ha? Such names are too outdated for you huh? We'll call each other whatever you wish then.

Name: Beidou
Topic: About Us: Eye for People Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: I tend to be a good judge of character. When you've learned to read the open ocean, reading people is a cinch. Haha, and that's how I knew you're the good sort the second I laid eyes on ya!

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: I chose you as my crewmate, as my comrade on the sea. It gives me great pride to be able to say that.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: To those that don't have a Vision, it must seem that those with Visions are like flagships from the Archons to follow. As such, I make sure to fly my flag with pride. That is my motivation.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: At a loss? When you don't know what to do, just take the first step. The rest will figure itself out naturally.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Every time I return from a long journey and I see the lapis gledes, I'm reminded that I'm almost home. The scenery out on the open ocean gets familiar real quick. Sure, they're birds of prey, but seeing them fly so freely is heart-warming.

Name: Beidou
Topic: About Ningguang: Liyue Qixing Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: Ningguang eh? As far as Liyue Qixing is concerned, she seems to be doing a good job. But for me, my responsibility lies with my ship and my men, and not with Liyue Qixing.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Ningguang is never really one to speak frankly, but she has been very direct with her criticism of me in the past. Haha... But hey, whether she likes me or hates me is her choice, nothing I can do to sway her.

Name: Beidou
Topic: About Xiangling: Culinary Skills Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: When we're out on the open ocean, the one thing we do all miss is Xiangling's cooking. When spirits are low, just thinking of her fried jueyun chili, bursting with flavor... It gives everyone just that little extra kick.

Name: Beidou
Topic: About Xiangling: Food Tasting Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: Xiangling huh? She sometimes uses some... interesting ingredients in her dishes to bring about some, ah... intriguing flavors. Though... there's no way she can improve without having someone to taste-test — a role that I am more than happy to fill.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: You mean the gentleman from Wangsheng Funeral Parlor? My men sometimes speak of the rumors surrounding him — he sounds interesting. Yes, if I get the chance I'd like to meet him someday.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: One year on the eve of the Lantern Rite, we ran into a storm as we were returning to port. Try as we did, we only made it back to Liyue Harbor in the dead of night, long after the lanterns had all been released. As I looked towards Guyun Stone Forest, I saw an adeptus, floating in the air, in the form of what appeared to be a young boy. I guess it is like the legends say — there really must be those that watch over Liyue, even if they cannot be seen.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Privately, Ganyu and I get on like a house on fire! But as you know, she's the secretary to the Liyue Qixing... and I'm not exactly in their good books right now! Doesn't bother me, but I wouldn't want to put Ganyu in a difficult position. So just keep what I said between us, yeah?

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: She's got a great personality, that one! The guys in the crew love that rock and roll of hers. Me? We have common ground, just... not when it comes to taste in music.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Yaoyao always comes on board to play when we're in the harbor. Trouble is, when it's time for her to go she gives you the puppy eyes, and no one has the heart to send her away... Means we're always cutting it quite close by the time we manage to set sail.

Name: Beidou
Topic: About Kaedehara Kazuha Friendship Lv. 4 Omnipresence Over Mortals
Voice Line: Kazuha? That scallywag actually blocked a strike from the Raiden Shogun outside Tenshukaku! Easier said than done... After the battle he came to the Crux Fleet — said he'd voyage with us a while longer. I was more than happy to oblige. If the day comes when he decides to set off again by himself on the next stage of his journey, I'll send him off with a drink, haha...

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Before you step foot on The Alcor, you need to answer one question. When the sea is full of perils — why is it that you still wish to come aboard my ship?

Name: Beidou
Topic: More About Beidou: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: You want to know of my legendary tales? Hahaha, that's just my men exaggerating, adding in their own little details. Although, if you were to ask me if I'm afraid of what monsters lurk in the deep, I'd tell you I have no fear of them.

Name: Beidou
Topic: More About Beidou: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: You wanna know why I help the common folk? Why not? Everyone has their low points in life. I don't really do anything, other than help steer those who are truly lost towards a brighter future.

Name: Beidou
Topic: More About Beidou: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: I've been through some hard times. When I was a child we had little money, so nothing to eat, and lived for years by stealing fruit off of people's trees. Even after I got my own ship, I was cast out by pompous merchants. But me telling you such stories is merely for your amusement. I have no intention of making you live through it too.

Name: Beidou
Topic: More About Beidou: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: I have many brothers that sail with me. I have asked, and remember, why each and every one of them came on board. You, however, are special. I know you still have your own things to deal with, and as such, I won't try to rope you into coming onboard permanently. But remember, there is always a place for you onboard The Alcor.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: My hobbies...? Lemme think... Well, there's adventure, sailing, making friends, drinking, eating... more than I can count on one hand.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: If you can change something, change it. If you can't, don't waste time thinking about it. That's how I go about things. But really, if you get stuck, come find me. I'll help you deal with it.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: I like food with robust flavors. Spicy fried meat or spicy tofu are my favorites. Sitting down to a big hearty meal together, where everyone can fill their bellies — now that's when things get lively! Haha, alright, alright, all this talk is making me hungry!

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: I'm not a fan of anything cold, it does nothing to fire up my appetite. I'd rather fry up a few fish.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Tastes good, I like it! Mind giving me a bowl of rice with this?

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Your cooking skills aren't bad at all, eating your food has me in a good mood.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: You know, at the end of the day, food is food, and that's fine by me.

Name: Beidou
Voice Line: Come, board my ship. I've gathered the crew. The food and drink are all prepared. Today is your birthday, so you are the captain. Haha, so: Where should we set sail?

Name: Beidou
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: Great! I feel much stronger.

Name: Beidou
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: We're making progress. Let's crack open a bottle to celebrate!

Name: Beidou
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: A prime example! It is an honor to have you aboard. I need to keep up if I'm to keep the respect of my crew.

Name: Beidou
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: After all this training, I feel like I'm finally at my best. Thank you... But please, I'd still like for you to keep me on my toes.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: This is your team? Cool... I like the vibe. I'm Bennett, leader of Benny's Adventure Team. Any chance we can team up? Please?

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Let's go find some treasure!

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: No one's joined me on an adventure in ages. C'mon, let's go!

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: "Good things come to those who don't wait around!" That's what they say, anyway. Knowing my luck, the opposite is probably true for me...

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: It always rains when I go on an adventure.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Don't stand too close to me, or you might get hit by lightning too.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Weather's not bad today... Oh crud, I jinxed it! Now it's bound to rain.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Careful! In this kind of wind, it's easy to get hit in the head by flying rocks.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Morning! Where's the adventure at today?

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: I brought a sandwich. You want some? I'll give you hal- *choking* *spluttering* ...Phew. Sorry, nearly choked to death there!

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Hey, wanna go talk to my dads for a bit? They tell the best adventure stories!

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: You're headed off? Cool. It was awesome adventuring with you. We should totally do it again!

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: I'm the leader of Benny's Adventure Team — a rising star in the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild! ...Where are the others? Ah, haha, they're all on leave right now.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Eh, it's not as bad as you've heard! Everyone falls into a trapper's pit or gets hit on the head by a falling tree now and then, right?

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Hahaha, you wish! Benny's Adventure Team has had no vacancies in ages... I mean, you must be spoiled for choice, right? Why'd you wanna join the unluckiest adventurer alive, anyway?

Name: Bennett
Topic: About Us: Division of Labor Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: From now on, I'll distract the monsters and set off the traps while you grab the treasure. Sound good? ...You don't like it? Oh — don't worry about me getting injured! It's what I'm best at... And for you, it would be my pleasure!

Name: Bennett
Topic: About Us: Dangerous Places Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: I think I get why you teamed up with me now. It's 'cause we're the same, you and I — we both like that adrenaline rush you get from being in dangerous situations. That's what makes adventuring so addictive!

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Getting recognized by the gods was the last thing I expected, seeing as how I'm so unlucky all the time. But if the gods haven't given up on me, I guess that means I shouldn't give up on me either.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Do you wanna come and see the view of Mondstadt from above some time? It's real pretty at night, when the city's all lit up and you can see the moon reflected on Cider Lake... Huh? From where? Haha, well, there was this one time when I got picked up by a tornado and ended up on this cliff way up high— Not interested? Oh, okay then, never mind.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: I actually quite like cabbage. It's not much to look at, but you can't imagine a world without it. You can grow it anywhere, it goes with everything, and the flavor never gets in the way. I dunno, there's something... nice about being ordinary.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: She's the best singer and dancer out there! I always go to watch her in concert after an adventure goes south — it really lifts my mood, chanting along with all the other fans, cheering her on. It's really kinda magical! It's no wonder she's so popular... Boy, if I had even half her popularity as leader of my adventure team...

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: She's a cute kid... but I have to keep my distance. Whenever she plays with me, her bombs always end up going off... It's not so much me I'm worried about, it would just be awful if something happened to Klee. The Knights of Favonius would never forgive me, that's for sure.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Oh yeah, the Prinzessin der Verurteilung from the world beyond! She's amazing. I keep asking her if we can go adventuring in her home world together, but each time I bring it up she sort of avoids the topic... She's probably just worried about my safety. Her home world sounds like a dangerous place, for sure.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: I keep meaning to ask Master Jean for some help with the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild, but I don't know how to go about it. The Guild doesn't have as many rules and regulations as the Knights of Favonius, the dads and I are pretty laid back about everything. Pretty sure that attitude wouldn't fly with Jean though... I guess I should read up on the Knights' etiquette or something?

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: He's my role model! Talk about team leaders — he's the Grand Master! Leads the whole darn Knights of Favonius! How incredible do you have to be to do that!? Recently, though, I've been thinking that having a smaller Adventure Team isn't such a bad thing after all. I mean, if things got too busy in the team, I'd have no time to look after all my dads in the guild, would I? Yeah... Yeah, things are fine the way they are.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Wolvendom guy! Looks a little on the feral side... doesn't talk much... but he's alright! We both love eating meat, so we got that in common. I sometimes cook some meat for him, and he teaches me how wolves communicate in return. Haha! You should join us next time!

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Oh, I know who you mean. The girl who's always charging around all over the place. She's always off adventuring in the wild, just like me... But if you ever see her near a cooking pot, you'll soon find a cloud of thick black smoke blowing in your direction, followed by the smell of burnt steak... Huh, maybe she was born unlucky too?

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Noelle's someone I've been watching for a while. She's really talented, and extremely hardworking. But somehow she's still a maid — the Knights of Favonius still haven't made her a knight. It's a shame, don't you think? Boy, if she switched to the Adventurers' Guild, she'd easily be one of the best there is.

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Oh... you wanna know about me? Haha, I'm just your average adventurer. 'Cept I'm more unlucky than average. Anyway, I'm nothing compared to you — you're the star of all those legendary tales. What do I got to show for myself?

Name: Bennett
Topic: More About Bennett: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: "The dads..." that's how I refer to all the older adventurers in Mondstadt. Apparently, I was an orphan kid that they rescued from the most perilous situation ever. How cool is that? I have such terrible luck all the time, and yet I was rescued against the odds and survived all this time. It's a miracle if you ask me.

Name: Bennett
Topic: More About Bennett: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: You've, uh, noticed then... Heh. Yeah, Benny's Adventure Team has been me on my own for a long time now. Reason is, I have such bad luck that even the most benign of adventures end up turning into the adventure from hell, and no one wants to come with me... Do you feel the same way?

Name: Bennett
Topic: More About Bennett: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: I was born unlucky. That's just the way it is, and I've lived with it so long now that I'm just used to it. But you know what? Maybe it's a good thing. It means I know that whatever luck I do have left is gonna run out sooner rather than later... so I'd better make the most of my life while it lasts. You know, go on plenty of adventures, meet loads of people... I mean, if I didn't live like that, I may never have even met you! Can you imagine? Haha!

Name: Bennett
Topic: More About Bennett: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: Time flies! We've been a team for a while now, haven't we? Anyway, I have a dream I wanna tell you about. Once the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild becomes the biggest branch in Teyvat, I wanna go adventuring all over the whole world! Benny's Adventure Team will be the greatest adventure team there ever was, because you and me are the greatest adventurers! ..."Since when?" Uh... I don't remember exactly when you signed onto Benny's Adventure Team. But whatever, it's just details, right?

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: I like all kinds of things, but most of all, I like adventures! One day I'm gonna find the most valuable treasure in the whole world, and then my dads can have a better life... and the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild will be back in business!

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Hmm... Well, if you really wanna know... When I have a bad day, I feel a bit glum. Like, it sucks when I come back empty-handed from an adventure, or when one of my dads' old injuries start acting up. But they're just small things really, after a good night's sleep I forget all about them. New day, new start! Haha!

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Meat! Meat is the best sustenance there is. Chicken-Mushroom Skewers, Steaks, and Sweet Madames are all my specialties. You won't go hungry if you come adventuring with me, that's for sure!

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: You can't really afford to be picky as an adventurer. That said, I can't really handle spicy food. I find it hard to breathe after eating Jueyun Chilis, like the spice went right into my lungs. And there's no avoiding the diarrhea afterward... It's the devil's fruit, I say. Who knows where it came from?

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Whoa, lucky me! Haha... Oh wait! Does that mean I just used all of my good luck for today...?

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Literally everything you cook ends up tasting amazing. Ha, you're awesome!

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Oh no... my stomach hurts...

Name: Bennett
Voice Line: Happy birthday! Best of luck in the year ahead. Don't worry, bad luck isn't contagious! As long as I'm around, it'll be drawn to me and not you, so you're safe.

Name: Bennett
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: I feel stronger in every sense! Just as unlucky as ever, though. Hahaha.

Name: Bennett
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: I'm catching up with you, Traveler! One step at a time.

Name: Bennett
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: Wow, check out all this power! How can I repay you, though? Hmm... Oh yeah! I know this Domain where there's a priceless treasure hidden somewhere inside! Let's go hit it up!

Name: Bennett
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: Thanks to your help, I should finally be able to keep everyone safe now. Hopefully, people's opinions of me will start to change. Once the unluckiest guy alive, with a million cuts and bruises to show it. Now, a dependable adventurer at long last! ...Heh, well, I—I can hope.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Welcome, weary Traveler from afar. Nights in the desert are cruel. You should rest here tonight. Sleep soundly, and know that I am watching over you.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: A shield is not enough to protect the most important things. That's why I must also wield a spear.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Peace and good health should be enjoyed by all... If I can provide everyone with a life such as this, I will be content.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: I will always seek to protect the things that are most important, no matter what it takes... even when it looks futile.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Stay warm, or you'll catch a cold.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: The thunder rumbles — does it scare you?

Name: Candace
Voice Line: This strange powder, it is... fine, like sand, but white as the clouds, and cold as ice...

Name: Candace
Voice Line: In the desert, a strong gale like this will create a sandstorm, so it's always a good idea to stay alert.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: I am right by your side. But if you're still nervous, just take my hand.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Good morning, Traveler. Did you sleep soundly last night?

Name: Candace
Voice Line: It's already noon. The golden eye of the sky glares down fiercely at this hour... Hehe, we should find some shade and escape its wrath.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: The night sky... that great canopy that descends when the light of day is gone. Who knows how many untold secrets it conceals...

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Yes, it's time to rest. You should sleep. Me? It's still much too early. The night is beautiful, but it's also full of danger... I must keep watch, for your sake.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: ...Strange? I'm not sure what you mean, both amber and blue are fairly common eye colors, I believe...

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Aaru Village is where I was born and grew up. Even back when I was too young to understand anything else about the world, the one thing I knew for sure was that one day, I would take over from my grandfather as sworn protector of our village... Today, I am grateful to now hold this duty. It is what I was born to do.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: My father was a scholar from the Akademiya. He originally came to Aaru Village on a research trip, and then he met my mother... As for her, unfortunately I only know what my father has told me. The day I was born, she began her journey into the eternal night...

Name: Candace
Topic: About Us: Hosting Guests King Deshret and the Three Magi
Voice Line: You will always be an honored guest of Aaru Village, no matter the day or time of your visit. If ever you tire of your journey, know that here, you can always find rest. Aaru Village welcomes you with open arms... as do I.

Name: Candace
Topic: About Us: Treasure in the Chest Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: They say that in every person's heart is a precious box, into which they place the things they treasure, so that they may guard them for their entire life. My heart harbors many treasures... Care to guess what those might be?

Name: Candace
Voice Line: When I received my Vision, people in the village kept telling me it was a blessing from Ahmar... but that doesn't matter to me. I swore to protect the village, and I will do it with or without a Vision.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: I do love spending time in Aaru Village. But each day I spend here is also a reminder that if I ever start to let my guard down... sooner or later, the day may come when I no longer have a life to return to here.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Have you come across Ajilenakh Nuts yet on your journey? They're naturally very sweet, and the villagers make the most delicious candies from them. If you're interested, you should give them a try.

Name: Candace
Topic: About Lesser Lord Kusanali Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: Perhaps it is a testament to the Dendro Archon's benevolence that I, a descendant of the Al-Ahmar bloodline, am able to live peacefully on this land. If so, I suppose I am grateful for this much, but... I am first and foremost a child of the desert.

Name: Candace
Topic: About Layla Friendship Lv. 4 Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
Voice Line: An eccentric girl who always seems to be in a trance...? Yes, I believe I've seen her before — near the Wall of Samiel. I couldn't make sense of what she was saying, nor the calculations she wrote down, but she seemed to be in a much better mood after she'd finished. Perhaps this is her way of relieving stress.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: A truly unusual scholar, unlike any other I've ever met. He sees and thinks about things in his own unique way... I only hope he never wields his sharp mind against the peace of Aaru Village.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: In the past, it was rare to see the Akademiya's General Mahamatra on this side of the Wall of Samiel, but recently he has been showing up here all the time. I believe that the Eremites have some truly terrifying stories to tell about him...

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Whenever Dehya brings any of her Eremites to stay at Aaru Village, she always keeps them on their very best behavior. I have to say, it makes my life a lot easier. Ah, Dehya... She might look like trouble at first, but the truth is that she's really quite adorable.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: You want to know more about me? ...I can't promise you a great story, but if you insist... Okay, let's wait until nightfall. We can sit by the fireside and I'll tell you all you wish to know.

Name: Candace
Topic: More About Candace: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: We are a people whose god is no longer with us. Lies pose no threat to us... the threat we face is the prospect of no tomorrow. The path before us is paved with barbs, there is pain in every step — yes, we tread forward clinging to a lie, but perhaps... perhaps there is more virtue in this than in selfishly embracing the truth, and death along with it...

Name: Candace
Topic: More About Candace: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: Even now, there are those who hold on to a belief that the King Deshret will be resurrected. But it's not possible. The past is but grains of sand, scattered to the four winds. The best we can do is to let go, and leave the wind to carry them to their final resting place.

Name: Candace
Topic: More About Candace: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: My shield? Well, according to what people outside the village say, it has the blessing of Bennu. With this shield in hand, all the grains of sand are my eyes and ears, and the desert is ready to do my bidding... Their imaginations can get a little carried away sometimes. But anyway, that aside, the main thing for me is it always works a charm.

Name: Candace
Topic: More About Candace: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: I'd really love to look into your future with my amber eye, if I could... Something tells me everything would be golden... somewhere between the color of sunlight and honey. A color filled with hope. Your journey will be a smooth road ahead. I give it my blessing.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: I always love taking walks in the village. Seeing that all is still well gives me a sense that... if today is just like yesterday, and yesterday is just like all the days before it... things have always been pleasant here, throughout history.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Every now and then, a few violent thugs make the mistake of trying to disrupt the peace and tranquility of Aaru Village. I do wonder... is chasing them into a monster-infested valley perhaps a little too... merciful? What do you think, do you have any better ideas on how they should be dealt with?

Name: Candace
Voice Line: To me... quantity is more important than taste when it comes to food. Life in the desert uses up more energy than you might think. After a day's work, there's nothing more satisfying than having a filling meal.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: I don't hate it, but compared to regular meat, eating fish is a real nuisance... Maybe it's because we don't really eat fish here in the desert, but for whatever reason, I'm just not very good at removing all those prickly little bones... This must sound ridiculous to you.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Mmm, absolutely delightful! This must have taken a lot of time and effort.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: For someone who spends so much time on the road, your cooking tastes so... homely.

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Maybe my definition of "edible" is a little too old-fashioned...

Name: Candace
Voice Line: Happy birthday! It's amazing to think that you were born on this day, years ago in the past. Do you have a birthday wish? If it involves going somewhere dangerous, let me join you — I'll be your guard. Or if you're looking to rest and revitalize, come to Aaru Village, and I'll serve you the finest meats and drinks we have.

Name: Candace
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: I feel a newfound strength within me... May it help me to be a better protector.

Name: Candace
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: My shield grows sturdier, and my spear sharper. One is an unstoppable force, the other an immovable object... Oh, but... I would never pit these against each other.

Name: Candace
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: I learned to wield the spear and shield knowing that I would one day need them, and today I use these skills to protect the village. So perhaps this new strength I now gain in the present is preparing me for trials that lie ahead in the future.

Name: Candace
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: I am now capable of venturing ahead of you, and fending off all dangers that would seek to come your way. If you trust me, then I invite you to close your eyes and leave the enemies to me.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: My name is Chongyun. My family has practiced the art of exorcism in Liyue for many generations. Fate has been generous in allowing my path to cross with that of your distinguished self. ...Oh, no — my services are free of charge!

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: Exorcism uses thaumaturgy and martial arts to conquer evil. There are other means to the same end, but they are not the true way.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: I take my meals cold to quiet the spirit and calm my vital energies. Qingxin-infused water with ice is the most effective.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: "Heart be pure, evil be erased. Mind be purged, world be..." Um... Ugh, I always forget that last part.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: There is no purer form of water than rain. It can aid us greatly in the purging of evil.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: Before the resounding thunder, evil must cower in fear.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: Ah, this weather is delightful.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: It is unwise to waste the precious morning hours. Time to train!

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: One's spiritual energies are at their peak at noon. We must take that time to practice.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: As the day winds down and the quiet of evening sets in, the atmosphere is ripe for focusing your mind. There is no better time than this for training.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: Whew. What a tiring day. You should get some rest. Don't forget what we agreed — we will investigate that haunted house tomorrow.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: We exorcists have been protectors of Liyue since ancient times, and our techniques have been passed down from generation to generation. Purging evil is second nature to us.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: *sigh* I didn't actually do anything. I just walked into that haunted house, and the problem was resolved... Do you think I should still take payment for this exorcism?

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: Your skills are impressive. When you finish with a hilichurl— I mean, an evil spirit, it is surely banished from this world for good. How about we team up?

Name: Chongyun
Topic: About Us: Ghost Stories Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: By now, you must be well acquainted with Liyue's supernatural phenomena. Now, about the evil beings you speak of in lands beyond... I would very much like to see them too.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: Visions are powerful, but one would be foolish to place blind faith in them. Personally, I trust more in thaumaturgy and martial arts. In the end, one cannot become truly proficient without vigorous training.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: There are rumors abound concerning evil spirits in Liyue, but not all have truth to them. In fact, some strange commissions wind up having nothing to do with them at all.

Name: Chongyun
Topic: Interesting Things A New Star Approaches
Voice Line: I have heard there are many strange and rare things sealed within the amber from Mt. Hulao. Could some of them be the fabled demons of which the ancient legends speak? I would love to investigate.

Name: Chongyun
Topic: About Zhongli Friendship Lv. 4 Farewell, Archaic Lord
Voice Line: That Zhongli from the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor seems to be quite an incredible man. Just think, common folk might gang up to commit a murder, we exorcists vanquish demons — but he alone buries the bodies of the adepti.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: I do admire Xingqiu for his devotion to chivalry and his martial arts proficiency. However — I must warn you that he definitely has a mean side, too. If you find that you fall foul of any of his antics, come to me and we'll form a "Victims of Xingqiu" alliance. There is strength in numbers.

Name: Chongyun
Voice Line: The Conqueror of Demons himself has defended Liyue side-by-side with we exorcists for generations, day after day, night after night. I have the utmost respect for Adeptus Xiao. It's just... Why must he be so disparaging toward us? He says our repertoire is lacking and our power is trivial. I'm sorry, but I just can't accept that.

Name: Chongyun
