Voice Line: That said, a Vision doesn't hurt to have as a little accessory. It is, after all, the one useful study tool that miserly old lady ever gave me, in a rare act of generosity.

Name: Mona
Voice Line: Do you know about constellations? Astrologers believe that the patterns of the stars map out the destinies of Vision bearers — past, present, and future, everything is written in the stars.

Name: Mona
Voice Line: This... travel companion of yours — do you know anything of her origins? No matter what, I cannot seem to discern a single shred of information regarding this floating fairy's fate. ...Oh? So you don't know where she comes from, either?

Name: Mona
Voice Line: You mean the Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius? Her constellation is Leo Minor, which represents strength and responsibility shouldered too young... Though the lioness has been separated from her pride for a long time, she grows from strength to strength, and the day will come when she is ready to return as its glorious leader.

Name: Mona
Voice Line: Albedo? Ah... I envy his ability to solely focus on his research without getting bogged down in mundane worldly affairs. What a wonderful life! If that batty old lady hadn't had one too many screws loose, perhaps that's the life I'd be living by now myself...

Name: Mona
Voice Line: Ah yes, Alice's daughter. She's in the custody of the Knights of Favonius, and Albedo looks after her too. She's blessed to have Trifolium as her constellation, which represents good luck. I'm slightly envious... *smirk* Although, if I'd been blessed with good luck, I suppose I never would have had the great honor of running into that old woman, would I...

Name: Mona
Voice Line: Diluc Ragnvindr. His constellation, Noctua, represents vigilance in the darkness of night... A lone guardian keeping watch, longing for the splendor of dawn, yet destined to solitude in the dark days preceding its arrival. ...Or, wait, maybe Noctua's the one tied to wealth...?

Name: Mona
Voice Line: Kaeya Alberich? He's a Pavo Ocellus. Destined for greatness and grandeur... and to hide ugly realities behind a layer of charm and elegance. He believes he has made a clean break with his past, but one day fate will catch up with him. When it does, he will have a major decision to make.

Name: Mona
Voice Line: A Tempus Fugit... The constellation derives its name from the hourglass, and stands for knowledge and time — or rather, the trade-off between them. As each grain of sand falls down, a moment of time — of life, even, dies for good. To stop the unrelenting flow of sand, one would have to turn the hourglass on its side. But once the sand comes to rest, it remains motionless forever... Hmm, maybe 'becomes lazy' is more accurate than 'comes to rest,' in this case.

Name: Mona
Voice Line: Venti? The bard that sits around doing nothing all day? What's so interesting about him? Sure, I guess I can take a look... Huh, that's weird, the scryglass, it's... I can't see a thing... this wind... I can't... open my eyes! No, my hat! Ah! My clothes, stop! The wind's going to strip all my clothes off! Make it stop, make it stop! ...Alright, alright! I'll never do this again!

Name: Mona
Voice Line: You want to chat... for fun? Oh... I don't usually have spare time for such activities, especially when I have so many columns left to write... Then again, since it's you, it might be worth it. Hehe, a change of pace once in a while isn't such a bad thing.

Name: Mona
Topic: More About Mona: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: Income? From astrology...? You can't use... things like Mora to determine the value of astrology! You need to understand: hydromancy is the one and only means of discerning people's true destiny in the whole of Teyvat! No matter how much Mora or gems you might have, the value of fate is quite incalculable! Perhaps not the smartest question you might have had for me...

Name: Mona
Topic: More About Mona: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: You want me to explain how astrology works? I'm not sure you'd understand even if I told you. But since you ask... The method I use is called hydromancy. The art of inferring fate from the illusory reflection of the stars on the water's surface. The inverted reflection in the water is an image of the heavens from within which the truth of our world can be observed. ...It is the one and only success story of that old lady's research endeavors.

Name: Mona
Topic: More About Mona: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: Mona Megistus, the Astrologist — we came up with that name together, the old lady and me. She said it had a nice ring to it... But then she started calling me 'Meg' for short, which I hate, because obviously 'Mona' is already sufficient for a shorter name — No! You are NOT allowed to call me that, it's embarrassing! Gah! I knew I shouldn't have told you!

Name: Mona
Topic: More About Mona: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: The golden rule all fortune tellers abide is: never offer advice. Only state the results of the divination. Otherwise, you risk your fate becoming tangled up with that of your subject. But for you, I will make an exception to this rule — because our fates have been intertwined from the beginning.

Name: Mona
Voice Line: My hobby? Stargazing! In this all-too-real world in which we live, we all need to look up from the dust once in a while and fix our gaze on the stars, in a spirit of wonder... that, plus the whole thing about me being an astrologer.

Name: Mona
Voice Line: The equipment repair bill is due, and so is the final payment for that celestial globe I ordered... Also, I still need to renew my journal subscriptions, not to mention pay the rent... Hmm, which one to prioritize? ...Ah, I'll pay off the celestial globe first, if I leave it any longer they'll sell out and then I'll never get my hands on one...

Name: Mona
Voice Line: Salad. Salad is by far the best food in the world. Cheap to buy, easy to whip up, filling, and it's the most convenient thing there is when you're working on a column or fixing some equipment — I mean, who's got time for a proper dinner anyway?

Name: Mona
Voice Line: You know, all those... overpriced, fancy foods. Personally, I think it's uncivilized and, frankly, dangerous to splash out and indulge yourself every time you have a little hunger pang.

Name: Mona
Voice Line: Ah, so satisfied... Who would have thought knowing you would bear so many benefits.

Name: Mona
Voice Line: Just to be clear... you're sure I don't have to pay... for any of this?

Name: Mona
Voice Line: I don't mean to nitpick, or anything, it's just... I haven't quite eaten enough.

Name: Mona
Voice Line: Happy Birthday. Here's my gift to you — it's a bag containing some words of advice that may help you through tough patches. ...No, don't open it yet. During the year ahead, this bag will open itself when the right time comes.

Name: Mona
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: This was ordained by fate! Long had I forseen it.

Name: Mona
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: ...One step closer. Maybe soon I shall finally uncover the truth of this world?

Name: Mona
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: My scryglass has long since preordained all that will take place beneath the stars it reflects.

Name: Mona
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: In the reflection of the water, I see the ascension of the morning star.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Hello, I'm Nilou from Zubayr Theater. We have one dance scheduled for today, and it's about to start — keep your eyes peeled!

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: First get into position like this, then move like that... Yep, that's it.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Take a deep breath, as if you're about to blow up a huge balloon. Exhale all your sleepiness into it, and then, poof — it's now flying away!

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Relaxing days like this are nice... Let's take it easy.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: The weather and our moods are the same — they can both get gloomy. It's all right, though, because the sky will become even brighter after the rain.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Thunder is kinda scary. Are you afraid of it? If so, I can share a nifty method to help with that.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Huh? Wow, it's snowing. You can really hear the snow falling. Add in the swirling snowflakes, and it feels like the spirit of nature is dancing.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Sunny days are so warm and cozy... *yawn* They make me sleepy...

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Are you all right? Watch out for sandstorms.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Good morning! Huh, why are you staring at me? ...M—My hair's sticking up? Ahh, don't look! I'll go fix it right now.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Uhh... Mmm... Should I eat some baked goods, or should I get something with rice? Or maybe... I can have some hummus instead?

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Good evening! I have a performance at Zubayr Theater tonight. Want some tickets?

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Remember, let out all your frustrations before bedtime for a better night's rest. If you want, I'm more than happy to be your audience.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Sometimes, you can convey more with dance than words. If you don't know what to say, then just dance.

Name: Nilou
Topic: About Nilou: Dance and Wisdom Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: You need an extreme amount of talent to pursue knowledge and wisdom. Many people throw their entire lives into it, only to end up burned out and depressed... Dance isn't like that. You don't have to understand what you're seeing to enjoy watching it. If I can use my movements to demonstrate the beauty and meaning of dance, then I'm happy.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Are you sulking? That's no good — c'mon, follow my lead. First, use your right hand to draw a biiig circle in front of you. Then, use both hands to take all those negative feelings off your chest and into the circle. Next, push it away as hard as you can! So? Feeling better now?

Name: Nilou
Topic: About Us: Going on Adventures Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: I've never left Sumeru City, but... I want to go on adventures with you. Going to new places will be fine as long as I can adjust... Umm, quick question: Inazuma's beaches won't have huge sandworms that'll suddenly jump out at us, right?

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: I received my Vision when I debuted on stage. If even the goddess was willing to watch my performance, then that must mean she had acknowledged the beauty of human-made art.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: It's normal for hard work to produce no results. For example, no matter how hard I try, I can never understand the Rtawahists' teachings. When you're stuck, shake up your mind, flip your brain around, and change the direction you're going in.

Name: Nilou
Topic: Interesting Things: Dance of the Crystalflies
Voice Line: Crystalflies come in all sorts of colors. They're so pretty that you can't not be curious. When you quietly reach out to one, it instantly steps into an elegant and nimble dance, and flies away from you. Hehe, if I could fly, I'd take dance lessons from them.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: When the Goddess of Flowers danced, real Padisarahs would bloom underneath her feet. That sounds like such a beautiful scene. I'd love to see it.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: I don't really like interacting with people from the Akademiya because they don't view the arts too kindly. I often wonder what they do when they're bored... Huh, Cyno plays Genius Invokation TCG? I can't believe it...

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: I hear he's a really talented botanist. He must be good at telling apart mushrooms. At least, he would never have to worry about eating a poisonous one... I'm so jealous.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: She sometimes comes to watch my performances. She's a really hard-working Trainee Forest Ranger. One time, she warned me about getting lost. What did she mean by that? It's not like I've gotten lost before...

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: I heard he was the one who built the magnificent Palace of Alcazarzaray. He must have had a wonderful time making such a masterpiece, like when I'm in the middle of dance practice. Just thinking about dancing for everyone gives me so much happiness and motivation.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: It's hard to believe that so many things have happened recently... I wanted to pick out a good present for Dehya and Dunyarzad, but I just can't make up my mind. Everyone at the Grand Bazaar has given me many suggestions, but if I took them all, it'd be too much... What should I do...

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: The big-spending merchant Dori has watched me dance before. I remember that she talked with Mr. Zubayr once, and then never came back. Did something happen? ...Huh? She wanted me to go on tour around Teyvat? No way, Mr. Zubayr definitely would've refused for me! ...Ahh, please tell me he has...

Name: Nilou
Topic: About Lesser Lord Kusanali Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: The people of the Great Bazaar love Lesser Lord Kusanali. I'd love to hear her thoughts on my Dance of Sabzeruz... Oh, no, no, forget it... If she were in the audience, I'd get stage fright...

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Aaagh! Sorry, I'm trying to decide what to eat, and I got lost in thought. Hee-hee, do you need help with anything?

Name: Nilou
Topic: More About Nilou: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: My teacher taught me everything there is to know about dance, but she said that the most important thing is putting feeling into your movements. Only then can you move your audience and convey emotion. To express beauty, I must first become the embodiment of beauty.

Name: Nilou
Topic: More About Nilou: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: Sometimes, I receive letters from showgoers who say that my dancing has cheered them up. I always share this kind of happy news with everyone at Zubayr Theater. Even though I'm the one the audience sees on the stage, it's because of everyone's collective efforts that I can stand up there in the first place.

Name: Nilou
Topic: More About Nilou: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: The Grand Bazaar occasionally hosts other kinds of performances, such as juggling showcases. I've tried juggling before, but I always end up catching the balls with my head... Mr. Zubayr and everyone else just laughed at me. They probably thought I had really good hand-eye coordination. Hee-hee, I've been exposed.

Name: Nilou
Topic: More About Nilou: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: Someone once told me that I was like a shining oasis that restored life and happiness to others with its warmth. That was nice of them to say, and I was happy to hear it, but... what I want to show people is much more than that. After spending so much time with you, though, I finally understand how it feels to have someone care for and look after you. Now... Now, I feel like that comparison is a far better one for you.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: "My life is dance," or "dance is my life"... Which phrase is the better way to describe it? Agh, I'm no good at logical things like this. Anyway, I'll just keep on dancing. I want to use my performances to show the beauty of art to more people.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: I still can't tell poisonous mushrooms apart from non-poisonous ones... Apparently, color doesn't mean much — poisonous mushrooms can be bright or dull. Mmm, I feel like I understand, but I also don't...

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Sweets always make you feel better! Most people in Sumeru love them. Wanna try some? I'll get some for you!

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: I have a hard time eating mushrooms, mostly because I'm scared... Not the type of scared that makes you want to run away, though! When I was little, I once ate a poisonous mushroom and was bedridden for days... If you want to eat any of Sumeru's mushroom dishes, please make sure to check that the ingredients are all edible!

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: This must be what it feels like to have flavors dancing on your tongue... How wonderful!

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Thank you. You must have put a lot of love and effort into this dish, just like I put so much of me into my dance practice.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Sorry, my appetite's been a bit off lately. Please don't take offense.

Name: Nilou
Voice Line: Umm... Happy birthday! I learned a new dance, and I want to show it to you. Uh, am I nervous? *sigh* You saw right through me. It's because... I wanted to incorporate my feelings into the moves, but then the choreography just got more and more difficult... Anyway, I just wish that your life will always be full of wonder and happiness.

Name: Nilou
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: Huh? What's this feeling...?

Name: Nilou
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: I'm done warming up. I can do even better now!

Name: Nilou
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: I feel like I'm lying down on the back of a massive Anemo Slime. Ahh, it's so light and comfy~

Name: Nilou
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: I really like being with you. I don't know why, but it feels like a butterfly is trying to burst out of my chest... Anyway, how about I show a new dance to you?

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: I am Ningguang, Tianquan of Qixing. You wish to trade? You be my personal bodyguard, and I will show you how to get ahead in Liyue.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Even if an antique is priceless, the happiness it brings lasts for only the moment you obtain it.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: In a trade war, the perfect hunter leaves no trace.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: We should look for a new investment. Mora doesn't grow on trees.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: It's raining. Fetch an umbrella for me, would you?

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Nothing more than regular snowfall. One day I'll take you to see the "snow" that falls over in Liyue.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Calm weather? Do not trust your eyes. Your eyes can lie to you.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Gales like this can be the demise of fishermen, not to mention... Heh, nevermind.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Morning. Report your affairs, in order of priority.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Liuli Pavilion or Xinyue Kiosk. Which would you prefer to go to for lunch?

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: The tea house has no more rooms? Then come, sit in the Jade Chamber... if you can afford the price.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Sure. Go rest. If anything important comes up, I will be sure to send for you.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Be it simple price negotiation or a full-blown trade war, momentum and bargaining chips are but minor factors. To win, you need to be first to find out what cards your opponent is holding.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: About Ningguang: Impression Friendship Lv. 4 A New Star Approaches
Voice Line: Your impressions of me have changed? Haha, well, at first I required your strength, so naturally I had to be as cordial as possible. But now that we are partners bound by contract, we may do away with such pretentious formalities.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: I suppose you've heard enough rumors about me. Hehe... What kind of person am I? I shall leave that for you to decide... Of course, your judgement will become a part of the rumor.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: You've been with me for some time now. Have you learned to observe? Then observe me. Observe me right down to my very core.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: About Us: Jade Chamber Friendship Lv. 6 Farewell, Archaic Lord
Voice Line: Come forward, stand beside me. Do you see the Jade Chamber? At first it was just a room, and now it clouds Liyue. When the time comes that it hangs above all of the seven nations, you shall stand by my side on that day too.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: There's no need to use a Vision in affairs that Mora can solve. As far as affairs only a Vision can solve go, I know of only one...

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Gamblers always place their bets on the next dice roll... But the bankers always have the last laugh, and they never touch a single die.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: Something to Share: Goal Friendship Lv. 6 A New Star Approaches
Voice Line: The departure of Rex Lapis will be no small test for both the Qixing and the city of Liyue. Seldom has any matter kept me tossing and turning at night like recent events.Nevertheless, I shall not lose sight of my goal. There will come a day when the shadow cast by the Jade Chamber reaches every end of Teyvat.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: In Liyue's ancient texts, there's no shortage of mentioning the beauty of the glaze lily, but in the modern era, the flower is on the brink of extinction. Now they can only be found in Yujing Terrace, and as such to come with a hefty price tag.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: That... captain. She clearly receives the adoration of many, but will always be the first to disregard the rules. The fines she has paid would be enough to buy her a whole new ship...

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Perhaps you've never heard me speak like this. All that can be said has been said — both the good and the bad — but she still does as she pleases. Forget it. Keep Beidou out of my sight.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Zhongli... Of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. He's very versed in a great deal of affairs. Although... such excellent pawns are of no use to me until I know their weaknesses.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: The second son of the Feiyun Commerce Guild. People like him can't stand the sight of me, which is only to be expected. I have no intention of troubling him either. Those who have different beliefs should not work together.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: That girl from Wanmin Restaurant... Her suspicion towards me is always written all over her face... Hehe, I wonder what face she would make if only she knew how much I helped finance that restaurant...

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: One cannot afford to be overly reliant on others — even when it comes to Ganyu. There is a Liyue saying which goes, "Even the most meticulous can fall prey to happenstance." When there are important affairs to deal with, it is always safer to investigate and resolve it personally.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: I presume you mean the girl whom Ganyu has taken under her wing. Do not worry, I have no plans to make this matter public. I am content to extend some leniency to the odd bit of mischievous maneuvering by that boat captain. One thing, though — Yaoyao seems to have become somewhat enamored with seafood lately. You should try to convince her to include some more fruits and vegetables in her diet.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: About Keqing Friendship Lv. 4 A New Star Approaches
Voice Line: Yuheng... She has changed a lot recently. But is Liyue better off with the Yuheng we have now, or the Yuheng we used to know? Only time will tell.(Actual Voice-Over: The Yuheng... She has changed a lot recently. But is Liyue better off with the Yuheng we have now, or the Yuheng we used to know? Only time will tell.)

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: The Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt, a strict and impeccable woman. Her flawless etiquette knows no fault, even her letters are meticulously written and creased according to the prescribed rules. It is such easily overlooked details that offer a glimpse into the true qualities of one's character.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Yanfei? I suppose you could say she's a dear rival of mine... Were she not so deft at explaining the meanders of the law and providing her clients with all sorts of cunning suggestions, it would take me many more months to identify existing loopholes in the legal codices and tighten them one by one.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: About Shenhe Friendship Lv. 4 The Crane Returns on the Wind
Voice Line: How is Miss Shenhe doing as of late? Please, look out for her whenever you can. I am most grateful to both of you for your assistance with rebuilding the Jade Chamber. Ahem, and on a more personal note — please know that if you are ever free, a cup of the finest tea will always be waiting for you here.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Yun Jin... Are you able to appreciate her performances? It might be difficult at first, but I would encourage you to give it a chance. The reason why I decided to invest into her opera troupe is quite simple: Elegant art forms like these deserve to be passed down to future generations.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: She's a very interesting character. I can say with the utmost confidence that she is someone I trust unreservedly. She handles herself impeccably, which means she stays beyond reproach. Hehe, since you both have high intelligence in common, hopefully you will get along very well.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Seeing as it's you, there's no need to keep up the formalities. You can be a little more casual. But I still ask that you respect my time. If you have something to say, be concise — I have no time to waste.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: More About Ningguang: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: I've always believed that children are the most naive and innocent. The reports they give me are of the most value. So what about you? What will you have for me?

Name: Ningguang
Topic: More About Ningguang: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: I've been thinking about something lately. If I were to keep you in Liyue, perhaps... at the right time, I might be able to leverage this city to... For now, it's mere conjecture. I should really consider whether the investment is worth it some more.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: More About Ningguang: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: You can learn from me, and use Mora to make things a little easier for yourself. But remember, relationships built on Mora can only be relied on for a time. Hehe... and that is why I have never brought Mora into our relationship.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: More About Ningguang: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: This is truly a great investment. Sure, no Mora has been made from it, but the time I've spent with you is already a solid return. Haha, seems I win again — I put my money on the right person.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Care for a game of Liyue Millennial? It'll give me an opportunity to see exactly how good you are as a player.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Concerns? If I told you the concerns of the Liyue Qixing, do you think your shoulders could bear the burden? And, if you ever make the mistake of mentioning them to others...

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: A slow-boiled soup of leftover chicken and pork bones drenched over some cabbage leaves. I have few culinary requirements. Having a few staple dishes like this is enough.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: I've come across those who demand golden crab for every meal. Though it all seems so grandiose, I really have no desire for such frivolousness. If you're ever thinking of taking me out for such a dinner, you'd be better off just giving the Mora to me directly.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Mmm... You have surpassed my expectations, again.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: With some things, if you haven't grasped the essentials, all the hard work in the world can go to waste... Know what I mean?

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: Ugh... It's the thought that counts.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: These are some of Liyue's finest brocades, woven from silk flowers. This one is for you, and this one... I hope that someday soon, you will be able to give it to your sister and I hope that she'll like it. I wish you both a happy birthday.

Name: Ningguang
Voice Line: This is one of Liyue's finest brocades, woven from Silk Flowers. You can use it to have some clothing made, and have a happy birthday.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: There's no style in resorting to violence. It's simply the worst of all the bad decisions you could make.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: Cashing in time and Mora for power... Interesting. This shows their true value.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: What is it that you hold so dear that is making you so persistent...? No, don't tell me. Give me more time to understand you myself.

Name: Ningguang
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: I'm usually not so quick to place my trust in others, but it seems I will no longer be able to make such claims. You've done splendidly. If only I had more like you... No, perhaps you... alone are enough.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: My name is Noelle, maid of the Knights of Favonius, and it's my pleasure to be joining you on your adventure today. Should you encounter any problems at any point throughout your journey, please do not hesitate to call me and I will be delighted to provide you with my full assistance. Yes, starting right now — what do you need?

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Leave it to me! All of it, whatever it is! ...What... exactly is "it"? I didn't quite catch your request...

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: You seem tired. Would you like some tea? I'll brew you some. Do you take sugar? One cube, or two?

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Whenever you need me, I'll be there.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Oh dear, everyone's laundry is still on the line! May I be excused to fetch it in?

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Please stay indoors until the storm passes. I will deal with any urgent outdoor business.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Such fair weather. Why don't we do a bit of sunny work? Oh, what sort of work is that, you ask? Haha, well, anything that makes you feel bright and sunny too.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Can you hear the Anemo Archon's voice on the breeze? It calms me down whenever I get flustered.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Good morning! Breakfast is served. I will be on hand the whole time. Should you find that anything is not to your taste, please, do not hesitate to let me know.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Ready for your tea break? Please wait here while I get it ready. Oh yes, I also made Lighter-Than-Air Pancakes! You simply must try one, it's my specialty.(Actual Voice-Over: Ready for your tea break? Please wait here while I get it ready. Oh yes, I also made Tea Break Pancakes! You simply must try one, it's my specialty.)

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Everyone has free time in the evening, and that is when I am busiest. Where have Amber's washed hairbands been placed? How many new eyepatches did Kaeya buy? Keeping track of all these things is a maid's responsibility.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Please get some rest, you must be tired from today's adventure. I should head back to the Knights of F— Sorry? you want me to watch over you until you fall asleep? I—I... I mean, of course, it's no problem. But, um... You're not just teasing me, are you?

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: In my job I do the exact same things every day — a far cry from being a true knight, that's for sure. But ultimately this is all part of my training, and when it comes to training, actions speak louder than words.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: I'm a bit useless in an argument because I can't really explain my reasoning clearly. People find that hard to understand, so instead, I try to just get on with my work in my own way. But then they call me stubborn. All I try to do is convince people with results instead of trying to talk them round... Is that really stubborn of me?

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: I am devoted to what I do, but make no mistake — I devote myself freely. A maid, to me, is the most liberating job there is. I'm a chef, a gardener, a warrior, a guide... I can be anything you need me to be!

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Even when you're too busy to eat three square meals, never eat something if you don't know where it came from, and always maintain a balance between meat and vegetables. Oh, and no swimming right after a meal. Haha, I do hope you're not thinking, "that's too much trouble I'll just leave it to Noelle," are you? ... Oh... but of course, if you are... Well then, just leave it to me.

Name: Noelle
Topic: About Us: Welcome Party Friendship Lv. 6 For a Tomorrow Without Tears
Voice Line: So I hear you're an Honorary Knight of Favonius? I envy you! I suppose that makes you my senior... Anyway, it's about time someone threw you a welcome party, surely? Leave it to me!

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: To be honest, I'm feeling a little dejected. Sure, this Vision proves that the Archons think I'm worthy, but why is it a Geo Vision? I mean, Geo's the furthest thing from Anemo, and for a Knight of Favonius...

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: I actually really like the smell of wine, I'm just not of drinking age yet. There have been a few times when I could have had a little taste if I'd wanted, and no one would ever have known... but I resisted the temptation. I feel like the first time you try it is probably really magical, so I want to save it till I'm older.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: A maid is required to keep everyone's secrets. That's why my favorite flower is the rose. Here in Mondstadt, the rose represents the saying "As wine bottles are corked, so too are my lips sealed." It reminds me to— What? ...Roses represent love in your hometown? I—I had no idea the rose held such a... passionate meaning.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: I really look up to Amber. Not only is she an accomplished knight, but she's a kind person too. She taught me how to make a Baron Bunny. I keep it on my person for luck, and it looks quite alright, don't you think?(Actual Voice-Over: I really look up to Amber. Not only is she an accomplished knight, but she's a kind person too. She taught me how to make a Baron Bunny. I keep it on my person for luck, and it looks quite alright, I think. Oh no, please do not be alarmed! There is no risk of explosion whatsoever.)

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: I've always been curious as to how she managed to become a fully-fledged knight at such a young age. I actually went to ask her for tips once, but I'd barely started talking to her when she grabbed me by the hand and took me outside the Knights headquarters to play with bombs. I thought it was some kind of training exercise at first, but Jean found us, and we both ended up in a solitary confinement...

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Master Jean has always been my role model, both in terms of ability and dedication. She holds herself and others to the same high standards, so if there ever comes a day when I meet with her approval, it will be the ultimate acknowledgment of all my efforts so far. Until then, there's no room for complacency!

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: At first I wanted to join his expedition party and do my part as a maid. But the Grand Master said no — it would give him more peace of mind if I stayed behind to take care of things in Mondstadt. It made me so happy to hear how much he values me! ...Okay, so apparently he said the same thing to a lot of people. But that doesn't change the fact he prizes me too!

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: He's a mysterious character! He comes and goes like the wind, and is always occupied with important business. I like the fact that he delegates some of the smaller jobs to me sometimes, it's nice to feel like part of the team, you know... What do you mean, "errand runner"? I don't see it like that at all! Okay, well yes, technically I run errands for him. But still, I really appreciate it!

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: He's asked me to join the Adventurers' Guild more than a few times, saying that life there would suit me better than with the Knights of Favonius. While I could help him take care of his "dads" like the other adventurers... the Knights hold a special meaning for me, and I'm not ready to give up on becoming one yet. No, I simply cannot accept his offer.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: I think she's from another world, but I don't know the details. One thing I do know, however, is that she loves the Knights of Favonius' library. She can always be found there with her nose in a book. I bring her some refreshments whenever I go in there to clean, and she always thanks me profusely. When I say profusely, I mean she goes a bit over the top, to be honest, and... I actually don't understand half of what she's saying.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: So once when I was cleaning the library, I noticed a book on the shelf called Flowers for Princess Fischl. At the time I assumed it was just a fantasy novel... I was so surprised to find out the main character is a real person. I could hardly believe it! She must be someone incredible to have a whole book dedicated to her.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: We take tea breaks together sometimes. Often she'll start humming a tune, saying inspiration has come to her. I'm not the right person to give useful feedback on anything musical... But I still love spending time with Barbara.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: How may I be of assistance? ...Oh, you just want to chat? Okay then! Well, if that's how I can help, then please feel free to chat as long as you'd like.

Name: Noelle
Topic: More About Noelle: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: Not a problem, I am here to serve in whatever capacity you require. You needn't be concerned about the way I feel. ...Huh? More tool than maid? I disagree! A tool might help you to complete a million tasks to a satisfactory standard, but it feels nothing. I, on the other hand, feel a strong sense of achievement every time I do something for you.

Name: Noelle
Topic: More About Noelle: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: Th—These treats are for me? Oh no, I couldn't, really. Well... Then I'll make some for you too! I'll go right now, right this instant! Half an hour... Ah, ok maybe an hour, tops. You can busy yourself with other things first, and I'll be sure to deliver them right to you, hot and fresh out of the oven!

Name: Noelle
Topic: More About Noelle: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: I spend all my days handling the most trivial of matters, but so long as it helps you in your adventure, or makes your life easier in some small way, I couldn't be happier. That's because each time I get a thank-you, it makes me feel like my work at least has some meaning, no matter how insignificant it seems.

Name: Noelle
Topic: More About Noelle: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: Even though I mostly work for the Knights of Favonius, I'm always looking out for ways I can help more people. These days, though, I seem to be spending more and more of my time with you... It might be a bit selfish of me... What do you think?

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: My hobby? I really like washing all sorts of things... clothes, floorboards, windows, you name it! Whenever I see something dirty I just want to give it a good old clean! It just gives me such a sense of achievement! ...Oh, you mean the things I do in my free time? Hmm... Same answer!

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: How to get more for your Mora? Last time I went all the way to Liyue, I visited every single shop to compare prices, and then carried everything back myself... I won't be doing that again though. I was on the road for so long that Jean was convinced I'd been gobbled up by Stormterror along the way!

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: My favorite is easily a Satisfying Salad. The best of Mondstadt's natural produce on one plate — highly nutritious, and a low calorie count. No, I never get sick of eating it — it's delicious! I've been eating it for ten years now.

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: I'm not a fussy eater. But I really don't like banquets... The reason being, as the maid I am expected to sample every single dish on the table to ensure its quality. Just one bite of each, of course, but it all adds up... Oh, the guilt...

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: How can you make such a simple dish taste so good? My admiration towards you just keeps growing!

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: This tastes wonderful! Uh, would you mind teaching me how to make this? After all, it is my duty as a maid...

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Hmm... This is more than I normally eat in a whole day...

Name: Noelle
Voice Line: Since you're always so busy adventuring, there must be so many little things you never get round to, surely? Well, you need not worry about them adding up, because today, I am all yours — your exclusive maid for the entire day! Just leave it all to me! ...Also, I'd like to take this opportunity to wish you a very happy birthday!

Name: Noelle
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: What is this... new power!? Thank you! Now I can be of assistance to even more people.

Name: Noelle
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: I cannot rest on my laurels. After all, I'm not even formally a knight yet. Until that day, I must work even harder.

Name: Noelle
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: Thank you for the opportunity to accompany you on your adventures, it's taught me a lot and I believe I have improved a lot. As a maid, I should be the one serving you, but it seems you have done more for me than I could ever imagine...

Name: Noelle
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: Everyone in Mondstadt is saying that I'm much more reliable now. Some even say that I'm to be made a true knight soon, but I don't think... What!? You think so too!? Oooohh, thank you! Coming from you, that is the best compliment I could ever hope for!

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: I am Qiqi. I am a zombie. And I forgot what comes next.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Hey, do you know what? Neither do I. I already forgot.(Actual Voice-Over: Hey, do you know what? Uh, neither do I. I... already forgot.)

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Let's go somewhere cooler.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: One, two, three, four. Two, two, three, four...

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: I forgot my umbrella again.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: I should have stayed indoors today.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: The wind is cool. I like it.(Actual Voice-Over: The wind is... frigid. I like it.)

Name: Qiqi
Topic: When the Wind Is Blowing Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: Hold my hand please. This wind could blow me away.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: I want to build a snowman. Will you help?

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Morning means it's time to check my diary. Because my diary reminds me what I'm supposed to do in the morning.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: I just remembered something. I forgot to help Dr. Baizhu prepare medications.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Good evening. How was your day? My day was fine, I think. But I can't remember.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: It's time for you to sleep now. I will do my stretches. ...Do not watch me please.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Did you ask me something? Sorry... I forgot.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: I have a poor memory for most things. But as far as I know, that doesn't matter.

Name: Qiqi
Topic: About Us: Memory Training Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: I started memory training exercises recently. So don't you worry, I won't forget who you are.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: My Vision can't turn back time. But at least it gives me the power to protect the people that matter most.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: I may be a corpse, but I am in much better physical condition than Dr. Baizhu.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Sometimes I see finches near the pharmacy. A nice little group of finches.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: I can never remember Dr. Baizhu's face. But I don't mind.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Warm. Fake smile. Death. I despise Hu Tao.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Sounds like a historical artifact to me.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Remind me, have I met him before?

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: ...Who?(Actual Voice-Over: Uh... who?)

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Cute. Like a nice little finch.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: On some nights, I almost feel like someone is doing stretches together with me. But maybe I just have an overactive imagination.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: What's going on?

Name: Qiqi
Topic: More About Qiqi: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: I perform stretches regularly to help me maintain the same range of movement as a normal human being. But as soon as I stop doing them, the rigor mortis starts to set in again.

Name: Qiqi
Topic: More About Qiqi: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: Some people want to take advantage of me. Others are terrified of me. But you... You are not like any of those people.

Name: Qiqi
Topic: More About Qiqi: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: Since we first met, I have had a warm feeling inside. Not the kind of warmth that makes me feel rotten. The other kind of warm. The one that happens inside my heart. Thank you. I am happy. Sadly I only recognize the current you. If I forget you... No. I will order myself to remember you.

Name: Qiqi
Topic: More About Qiqi: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: In the past, my only thought was: I must stay alive. Even though I didn't know what to live for. But now, I think I know. I want to live with you. I want to ask, can we stay together, for the rest of life, until death? Yes or no? Yes? Is that your real answer? Good, excellent. I promise to always protect you.(Actual Voice-Over: In the past, my only thought was: I must stay alive. Even though I didn't know what to live for. But now, I think I know. I want to live with you. I want to ask, can we always stay together, for the rest of life, until death? Yes or no? Yes? Is that your real answer? Good, excellent. I promise to always protect you.)

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: I want to have a pet. For example, a nice little finch.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: I don't know why, but high temperatures make me feel rotten and disgusting. And closer to death.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: I like coconut milk... But, I don't know what it tastes like.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Sorry, I have no idea.

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Cold. I like it. But, no flavor...

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Huh...

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: It's burning my tongue...

Name: Qiqi
Voice Line: Many happy returns. Here is a bag of herbal medicine for you. You must be very surprised that I remembered? Let me explain. Last time you told me, I wrote your birthday down on a piece of paper. If I look at something once a day, it eventually goes into my long-term memory, and it will stay there forever.

Name: Qiqi
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: Now, I have more power. But what does that mean? Please explain. Thank you.

Name: Qiqi
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: Ah, I understand. When I get stronger, I need to put more effort into controlling my strength.

Name: Qiqi
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: In the past, I did not understand the idea of becoming stronger than I already was. Now that I understand it well, I wish I was just a little stronger still.

Name: Qiqi
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: All of this is because of you. Thank you very much. Can you make me a promise? From now on, please, let me protect you. Do you accept? Yes or no?

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: No salutations needed. My exalted status shall not be disclosed as we travel among the common folk. I acknowledge that you are a person of superior ability. Henceforth, you will be my guard. Worry not. Should any danger arise, I shall dispose of it.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Inactivity serves no purpose whatsoever. Hmph.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: The world remains constant over the centuries. But human life is like the dew at dawn or a bubble rising through water. Transitory.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: All the world holds dear is but a backdrop of constant motion. I stand before it alone and unchanging.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Rainfall alone does not constitute a storm. Thunder is required.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: The Winter Shogun approaches.[TN • 1]

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Clear skies can do nothing to hide the brilliance of lightning. Divine bolts can strike even in the absence of rain. Do you see that tree? Wait...you understand? So... demonstration is not required? Good.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Yawning without covering your mouth? Uncouth. I will pardon your rudeness this time. Good morning to you, too.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: I command the thunder in all corners of the world to cease. Rest well tonight.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Thunder's roar and lightning's flash. So ephemeral. This is why reaching Eternity is desirable. ...Actually, this is why reaching Eternity is necessary.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Erosion is a terrible thing. This body's purpose is to withstand wear and tear, that the one within might achieve Eternity.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: I declare you my chamberlain. In other words, according to my judgment, you are useful to the Shogunate and loyal to me.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: No, I have nothing to share with you at this time. But you... You use elemental energy without the aid of a Vision. How is this possible? Please enlighten me.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Her body may have perished, but she became the Sacred Sakura. This, too, is a form of Eternity.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Kamisato... One of the most distinguished clans in all of Inazuma. Despite Ayato's trickery in regard to the Tri-Commission's affairs, he is nevertheless a loyal subject. His past misdeeds shall be excused.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: A loyal and righteous subject, and an accomplished warrior. She is worthy to be called a hero. With an heir of such great promise, the future prosperity of the Kujou Clan is assured.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Indeed. It was I who slew Orobaxi. But I also allowed the people of Sangonomiya to continue worshiping it as the Watatsumi Omikami, so that it might enjoy their offerings. Now, Sangonomiya has destroyed the local Narukami Shrine and rebels against the Shogunate. As the Divine Priestess representing the Watatsumi Omikami, she must be held accountable.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Who?

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Who? Ah, the firework maker. A manufacturer of fleeting illusions, enamored with the realm of fantasy and imagination, but a subject of mine nonetheless.Hmm? Fireworks were released on Tenryou Commission property? By whom... her?

Name: Raiden Shogun
Topic: More About the Raiden Shogun: I
Voice Line: State your query. To the point.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Topic: More About the Raiden Shogun: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: On stormy days, the people of Inazuma chant "kuwabara, kuwabara," believing that this will protect themselves from being struck by lightning. You need not worry about any storm summoned by my own hand — they will bring you no harm. Lightning storms that occur naturally, however, can be more unpredictable.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Foolish question. There are only two kinds of things — those that must be done and those that must not.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Foolish question. There are only two kinds of foods — those that must be consumed to nourish the body and those that harm it.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: A familiar flavor... Acceptable.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Leave it here, and I shall sample it.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Consuming this would be physically detrimental. Remove it from my presence.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Voice Line: Is today the day of your creation? Return to the city with me. I will read out a speech for you in front of all my attendants. "Embarrassing"? ...Understood.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: The initial stage of my journey, or Shoden, involves learning the nine-way sword slash and the foundations of the art of the polearm. There is no great variation from other traditions at this point. Or rather, it is the other traditions that do not differ from mine.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: At the intermediate stage of my journey, or Chuden, the art of the sword focuses on the study of various stances and transitions. The art of the polearm — slashes and backslashes.

Name: Raiden Shogun
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: The final stage of my journey, or Kaiden, is the study of the most profound techniques. Unavoidably, these draw heavily on elemental power, rendering them beyond the capabilities of most mortals. Most practitioners of other traditions are unable to ever reach this level.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: You smell... *sniff* nice! Let's hunt.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: *sniff* I smell rabbit.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: I'm hungry. Let's hunt.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: I keep watch. You leave, you call me.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: If you're scared of lightning, hide now.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Avoid the trees. Follow me.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Wind... I like the wind.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: The wind... bites hard.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: The sun is up. Time to hunt.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: I had a big lunch. Lots of meat. Mm, I'm happy.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Go to sleep. I watch the moon.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: You sleep now. I keep watch.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: I have no human family. I am a wolf.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: You are my friend. We can hunt. Together.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: I have iron claws and teeth of thunder. I protect you.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Vision helps Razor... fight with lightning tooth! Protect lupical!

Name: Razor
Voice Line: I like the stars at night. So many stars. In the sky, in the lake. And in the city.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: The wolves are my Lupical. My family.

Name: Razor
Topic: About Lisa Friendship Lv. 4 The Meaning of Lupical
Voice Line: Lisa lightning makes the sky black. She is strong. She is scary.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Shining Barbara is a good child. Very good child.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Diluc is red and black. Hot and cold.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Razor doesn't know poems, but... lupical likes them.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Bennett... Much talking. Eat with him, never full.

Name: Razor
Topic: About Klee Friendship Lv. 4 The Meaning of Lupical
Voice Line: Klee, friend! Friend, but... big hassle.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Varka? Razor doesn't know...

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Oh, Varka is... a name. That man big. Big steelclaw, Razor's name - Varka gave him. Oh... want to see him.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: You smell kind. Do you like meat?

Name: Razor
Topic: More About Razor: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: You are strong. Like a wolf. I like to hunt with you. We catch a lot.

Name: Razor
Topic: More About Razor: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: Lupical means wolf home— no, lupical means wolf family. My lupical lives in the woods. They say I am their lupical.

Name: Razor
Topic: More About Razor: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: My lupical is my only family. But I don't have four legs, not like them. Because I'm not a real wolf. Sometimes this makes me sad.

Name: Razor
Topic: More About Razor: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: When I run with you, when I hunt with you, I am happy. With you, I am not a wolf, I am not a boy, I am just me. I am Razor. Because you are my friend. You are my Lupical. I hope you feel happy, too!

Name: Razor
Voice Line: I like lupical. I like the woods. I like my friend. I like to run!

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Talking makes me tired. Talking is hard. But I have to try.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: I like meat and I like potatoes.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Greens are bad. Animal eats green things. Then I eat animal.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Smells good, also tastes good, I like it.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Eating this gives me energy, makes me happy.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Eating it, bad. Not eating it, also bad. I'm a bit sad.

Name: Razor
Voice Line: Today is your day. You were born on this day, many moons ago. I want to make you happy today. Can we eat meat together?

Name: Razor
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: Arms... bigger?

Name: Razor
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: Grr! Sharpen claws. Sharpen teeth. Become stronger!

Name: Razor
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: Run... Hunt... No. No! Must... become stronger!

Name: Razor
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: Teeth. Claws. Legs. All bigger. All stronger! To protect you.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Listen disciple, if you've got a problem you can't handle, then I'm the one for the job. But if you're looking for prayer, you'd better find some other Sister ...Huh? You're not a disciple?

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Don't we have a job to do?

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Everything is negotiable, except overtime.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Work hard and live each day to the fullest. That is what life in Mondstadt is all about, isn't it?

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: This will slow things down.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: ...What a nuisance.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: We should keep moving, but watch your step in the snow.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Blessings from the Anemo Archon Barsibato? Wait... no, it's Bartobas...?

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: *yawn* Good morning... I've missed morning mass, haven't I? Ugh, it starts too early anyway.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: I'd say I sleep even better in the afternoon sun. You should try it sometime.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Good evening. Don't expect to see me at prayer tonight... And don't ask why.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Go ahead, take a break. I'll handle things here.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Me? I'm just another ordinary person. Church, work... I just do what I have to do.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Each of the Sisters is worse than the next. If it's not about prayer, then it's about choir or some other thing I'm supposed to participate in... I'm trying to stay out of sight, so don't you dare tell them you saw me here.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Perhaps a god has the power to protect everyone if they would choose to do so, but that would never happen. Otherwise, people's suffering couldn't ever be taken seriously.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Pray. Not for the gods, nor the betterment of others... but for yourself.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Don't overdo it. Let me take care of the dirty work.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: A Vision... Could be proof of strength, or a medal for having survived... who knows? There're two sides to every coin. I won't limit my Vision with ceremonies and definitions. It witnesses me, and I witness it, that's all.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: You don't always know why good things happen, or why we should be happy about them. Heh... But if you ever face a problem too big to handle, don't give up hope. You never know, someone may be there to help, even if you can't see them.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: I take no interest in plant life and the sort, but the dandelion is an exception. How such a simple flower could turn into such a delectable wine is beyond me. A glass of dandelion wine after work is even better than sleeping in on Sunday.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Isn't it obvious? There's more than meets the eye to that rich tycoon. He's confident, yet discreet... and even a little bit dangerous.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Wine has its uses... like revealing someone's true colors, for example. Smooth talk is Kaeya's veil, but being me, I can see right through it. Hah, you should see him when he's drunk.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: There's something extremely interesting about this bard... I can't quite put my finger on it. There's something that makes him different from the others in Mondstadt.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Barbara is like a thorn in my side, always nagging me about mass and choir practice. I wouldn't be surprised if Sister Victoria specifically asked her to keep an eye on me.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: She's not only competent in her own work but also somehow manages to clear up various matters for others... Huh. Now that's a woman who deserves admiration.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: He's like an oil painting you find hanging on the wall in some ancient hall, profound and mysterious... hard to see through. But what can I say, I find people with stories... interesting.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Although I deplore those who play truant on a job, I respect her punctuality when it comes to closing up for the day.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Trouble, and lots of it. Although, it is sort of a cute kind of trouble...

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: I'm sure Varka means well, but his long-winded conversations get real old real quick. Although, he does really care for those around him, doesn't he?

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Father? I'm not familiar with the word. You could say that I don't have one — could also say I have many, too. What's it to you?

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Let's forgo the formalities. I'm here to finish a job. Just leave the dirty work to me.

Name: Rosaria
Topic: More About Rosaria: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: What's weird about a Sister without reverence for the gods? There are hunters who don't eat pork, and fisherman who don't eat fish, aren't there? Just because you do something doesn't mean you love to do it. That's how every job goes.

Name: Rosaria
Topic: More About Rosaria: III Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: This year's Dandelion Wine is sinfully good. Care for a glass?

Name: Rosaria
Topic: More About Rosaria: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: Mondstadt is a beast of light, both old and young. Old in the sense that it constantly requires someone's protection, yet too young to ever survive on its own. That's why there's people like me. I care for Mondstadt just as the other Sisters care for the believers, we are all guiding that which we love onward on the path towards freedom. Huh? Why do I call it a beast of light? Because people like myself can only be found in the dark...

Name: Rosaria
Topic: More About Rosaria: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: I sometimes feel that my former selves from years past still exist alongside me, urging me on. I'm sure you know the feeling, too. Even if you decide to venture down a new path, don't just abandon the former you. For that is the foundation upon which you now take footing. Do not fear your past, and do not be scared to come to grips with it.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: There are some troubles that only a stiff drink can take away. That being said, I never get drunk.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Ugh, definitely skipping next month's choir concert, but I bet Sister Victoria will be personally taking roll... What a nuisance.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Have you ever tried Beef Bourguignon? Big chunks of meat with the smooth taste of alcohol... Mmm, it's delectable.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: You mean I'm supposed to dip this hash brown in jam? Ugh, this is sacrilege!

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: It seems that our tastes are aligned when it comes to food.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: At least I'll be able to eat my fill with this.

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Do you really like this food?

Name: Rosaria
Voice Line: Today's your birthday, so if you have any dirty work that needs taking care of, I can give you a hand... Just don't tell anybody, got it?

Name: Rosaria
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: Hmm, just what I needed.

Name: Rosaria
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: You have a job for me? I've got time.

Name: Rosaria
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: Good. Getting stronger means finishing jobs quicker.

Name: Rosaria
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: I'm no stranger to spilling blood, but never have I possessed such power before. For such blessings, I give you thanks.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: I am Sangonomiya Kokomi, the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. My journey with you will be an opportunity to unwind... Ahem, I mean... to survey beyond our borders. Don't worry, I've left behind ample directives in my absence, and have also completed the island's projected development plans. Departing for a brief period will be of little consequence.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Yae Publishing House has released numerous works that lay out military strategy in a simple and pragmatic way. Those are my favorite.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Respect must be given to the will of every creature. Each fish in the ocean swims in its own direction.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Marching in the rain conceals the sound of our arrival, but is also a test of stamina...

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: The snow... have you ever seen such beauty?

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Such fortunate weather... Care for a walk?

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Mm... High winds. An incendiary attack would be particularly effective.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Good morning. I've just read a fascinating stratagem, would you like to study it together?

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Mmmm... to improve efficiency, we must make some adjustments to our battle plan for the afternoon.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Mm? Night already? Time seems to slip away when I'm with you.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Good night. Garner your strength for the battles ahead.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: The battlefield is unpredictable — one false move could mark utter defeat. Before the onset of battle, I bring every possible scenario into consideration, and turn my thoughts into written directives. These are then issued to the troops. ...It does seem at present like they're somewhat over-reliant on the directives, which worries me... If they read up on military strategy themselves, they could begin to rely on their own ability to read the battlefield. I need them to be able to identify and seize opportunities in the heat of the moment.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Mm... I hope we can put an end to this battle quickly. The Yae Publishing House has just released a new volume of "A Legend of Sword." Ah, I'd like nothing more than to curl up with a copy in my room and read it front to back.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: My mother once taught me that it takes a broad outlook to become a qualified leader. However, my younger years were mostly spent traveling between Sangonomiya and the army. I never had time to embark on my own adventure. So... there are many aspects of adventuring that I've yet to fully understand. Mm, you'll have to excuse my lack of experience in this area.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: It's said that the depths of a person's heart run deep indeed. Yet, as the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island, it is my duty to strive to understand each person's thoughts. Let's start with you, Traveler. What are you thinking about now? Let me take a guess...

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: In my book, Visions are symbols of aspiration, and aspiration is a precious thing indeed. This is exactly why the resistance was formed — to oppose the Vision Hunt Decree. Aspiration should never be abandoned or forcibly taken away.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: Anything To Share: Periodicals Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: Among Yae Publishing House's various publications, my personal favorite is the Teyvat Art of War. See, it has articles on classic military campaigns, as well as detailed analysis and commentary from famous strategists. There are a few that I particularly enjoy... Here, let me read them to you.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: Anything To Share: Diving Friendship Lv. 4
Voice Line: The world below water is not bright and sunny like that of dry land. Still, whenever I lend myself to the deep, my heart gradually fills with a permeating sense of peace. Fish move in faraway shoals, jellyfish dance around me, and my troubles start to simply wash away. Mmm... I could take you to see it sometime, what do you think?

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: I simply love Watatsumi Coral Pearls... They're not just a source of income for Watatsumi Island, but a gift from the sea itself.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Gorou is an exceptional general... sincere, determined, and courageous. He has a strong camaraderie with the troops and is able to come up with creative battle plans. He does, however, have one shortcoming... He often lets the excitement of battle get to his head. If you are ever deployed to the battlefield together, be sure to have a good rein on him when things get underway.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Mmm... I must admit, Kujou Sara is an opponent that cannot be taken lightly. She seldom employs cunning strategy, but her performance in open warfare is always admirable. The Shogun's Army places great trust in her abilities — they are united and ready to fight valiantly under her command, even to the death. Her forces have been a serious threat to the resistance on multiple occasions.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: I have also heard of Guuji Yae's great deeds. In all fairness, I hold her to be an outstanding shrine maiden, and she has performed her duties marvelously. I even heard that she holds responsibility where Yae Publishing House's light novels are concerned. An enigmatic individual to say the least...

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: About Raiden Shogun Friendship Lv. 4 Omnipresence Over Mortals
Voice Line: Now that the Vision Hunt Decree is over, Watatsumi Island has once again returned to normal life. It has never been my intent to scrutinize the rights and wrongs of the Shogun's actions, even to this day. What I do care about is the future of our island. It is my hope that the Shogun will fulfill her promise and that we can live with the Shogunate in peace. However, if there comes a day when she once again casts aside the aspirations of the people, I can assure you that we won't sit by and watch.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: About Beidou Friendship Lv. 4 Omnipresence Over Mortals
Voice Line: Ah... back when Beidou and I were carrying out ambushes against the Shogun's Army together, I raised my concerns that the enemy might detect our approach. But Beidou assured me of her fleet's unwavering discipline, and that raids could be carried out without detection. In the end, she was right, and that's exactly what happened. Now, every time the Watatsumi fleet encounters some sort of bottleneck, I consider inviting her to come and give them her instruction. There's no doubt, she runs a tight ship...

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: About Kaedehara Kazuha Friendship Lv. 4 Omnipresence Over Mortals
Voice Line: Kazuha once came and bunked with the resistance for a time. If I'm not mistaken, he got along very well with Gorou — they would often fight side-by-side in battle. Kazuha has a carefree personality and doesn't like constraints, but he would follow every command to the letter when he was among our ranks. In my opinion, not only is he an outstanding swordsman, but a very refined character.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Initially, I was astonished to see anyone coming to Watatsumi Island wearing a Tenryou Commission uniform. A Tenryou Commission samurai would never be that brazen, and a Tenryou Commission spy would never be that conspicuous. Shortly after, I discovered that he was a self-proclaimed "detective" by the name of Shikanoin, and that he took no interest in military, government, or commercial affairs. Instead, he seemed to have arrived for a bit of sightseeing. As such, I set a few eyes on him, but refrained from taking any action to remove him from the island. Be sure to talk to him if the chance ever presents itself.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: No matter how pressing the situation may become, I must remain composed. If I let the stress get to me, then what can I expect from others around me?

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: More About Sangonomiya Kokomi: II Friendship Lv. 3
Voice Line: Legend has it that our ancestors lived in a palace in the depths of the ocean, and that the god, Orobashi, brought us to the surface. I've often wondered, wouldn't a palace like that be too dark? Every time I think about it, I start to really appreciate the light...

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: More About Sangonomiya Kokomi: III Friendship Lv. 4 Omnipresence Over Mortals
Voice Line: After you left, the soldiers of Swordfish II nominated a temporary captain, but everyone was hoping that you'd return. I could only tell them that you'd been tasked with an important solo mission. If you get the chance, you should go visit them, I'm sure they'd love to see you.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: More About Sangonomiya Kokomi: IV Friendship Lv. 5
Voice Line: A long time ago, I had no intention of becoming the Divine Priestess. My only goal was to study military strategy and become an adviser. That way, I could remain behind the scenes and lessen my overall burden. *sigh* Fate had other ideas in store... You can't defy that which flows in your veins.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: More About Sangonomiya Kokomi: V Friendship Lv. 6
Voice Line: After becoming the Divine Priestess, I gradually grew accustomed to this life. At the very least, I have the power to change something when it doesn't sit well with me. More importantly, this title allowed me to meet you, did it not?

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Huh? What do I enjoy? Simple. I like to find a quiet place by myself and read books on strategy... Ahh, the whole day without interruption. I'd be even happier if we looked over some of it together... One thing though... You'd have to sleep on the floor.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: Sangonomiya Kokomi's Troubles Warriors' Dreams Like Spring Grass Renewing
Voice Line: To be quite honest, I'm not particularly skilled at communicating with others. Putting on my "Divine Priestess airs" certainly makes things easier, but once I run out of energy, I start to get a bit negative. I prevent others from seeing that side of me at all costs. The people of Watatsumi Island need a perfect leader, not some girl who likes to wile away her time at home.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: I just love eating Bird Egg Sushi. The ingredients are easy to find, and it's simple to prepare... Ah... perfect for military life. Sitting down to eat Bird Egg Sushi in the midst of war might seem a bit extravagant, but in most cases, simple food like this brings great satisfaction to the soldiers.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Mm... If I had to say, I'm not fond of any sort of seafood. But please, keep this strictly confidential. The fishing industry is essential to Watatsumi Island, and if word were to get out that seafood wasn't my thing, I'm afraid morale would be gravely affected.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Yummy, this is delicious! And it seems my energy is also... Ahem, I mean... Never mind...

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: I like to take my time and eat slowly, that way I can enjoy it for longer.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Oh, it seems we're at an impasse.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Voice Line: Happy birthday! So, what are your plans for the day? Oh, why don't we celebrate on Watatsumi Island? First, I'll take you out at daybreak to see the sunrise, then we can go diving during the heat of the day. In the evening, we can go for a stroll around Sangonomiya Shrine. If it rains, we'll find somewhere cozy to hide out with a few strategy books, and try to bake a cake together! In any case, no need to plan anything, the grand strategist has everything thought out for you!

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Intro Ascension Phase 1
Voice Line: Brute force is not my modus operandi. But becoming stronger isn't a bad thing.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up Ascension Phase 2
Voice Line: I'm just bubbling with energy... We'll make a formidable force in our next fight.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Climax Ascension Phase 4
Voice Line: The moon shines bright over the depths of the seas as the tides come and go. It seems that as I go from strength to strength, so does my state of mind flow.

Name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
Topic: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion Ascension Phase 6
Voice Line: I often used to succumb to self-doubt. I would think to myself, "Can a person like me really hold the title of Divine Priestess?" Now, the thought hardly crosses my mind. When I'm with you, I seem to be able to cut straight through most problems.

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: Sayu, Shuumatsuban, at your disposal! Whew, but if you don't need me right now, I'm gonna grab some sleep. Nope, no need to tuck me in — I need the extra room to grow into.

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: *yawns* *snoring*

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: Seems like I should have just stayed in bed today.

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: Surely I should be due a growth spurt by now?

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: Eek, let's find shelter, quick! Watering works on plants, but not people...

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: Phew, this weather is wild! Best thing to do is dive under the covers where it's dark and snug and warm and nyam nyam nyam~ *sleeps*

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: It's really easy to hide in weather like this. There's this ninjutsu technique called Cloak of Snow where you can pretty much make yourself invisible — all other people see when they look at you is the snowflakes dancing in the air. Wait, it's confidential though! Don't tell any of this to the shrine maiden...

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: Loooove it when the weather's like this, just makes you wanna... *yawn* doze off for a while.

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: A windy day is a good day for a getaway.

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: I always know it's time to get some shut-eye when the wind's so strong that I can't open my eyes anyway.

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: ...Morning? Already? Okay, I'm just gonna snooze for, like, 10 more minutes... Please, just 10 minutes... No? Okay, 5 minutes then? *snores*

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: Is it noon yet? Finally, I'm so ready for my nap.

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: Recon confirms, no sign of the shrine maiden within a 3-mile radius. Moving to the next phase: sleepy time!

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: At long last... bed time... G'night...

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: Yeah, I'm in the Shuumatsuban, but they only ever get me to do stuff like... *yawn* information gathering and stealing. So, y'know... it's not really a big deal if the work doesn't get done.

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: So I don't do any important work at the Shuumatsuban, and anything that gets put off for long enough ends up getting done by someone who's more suited to it anyway. Sleep, on the other hand — that is of the utmost importance. Because I need to get enough sleep to make sure I get my growth spurt.

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: Hey, will you do me a favor and let me know if you see the shrine maiden coming? I'm just gonna, um... rest my eyes for a moment.

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: I'm not a pet, y'know! Hmm, but since it's you... Okay, you can pat my head and I promise not to bite your hand. Just a little, though! If you pat someone's head too much, it stunts their growth.

Name: Sayu
Voice Line: My sword is crazy heavy, even with my ninjutsu training there's no way I could lift it without the help of my Vision. So yeah, having a Vision is a huge help for me.

Name: Sayu
